GSP33brsvbh2u:3: vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ samanvayavirodhaparihāralakṣaṇayoḥ saṃgatipradarśanāya sukhagrahaṇāya caitanyoḥ saṃkṣepatastātparyārthamāha-prathame 'dhyāya iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:8: tadevākhyā yasyāḥ sā smṛtistantrākhyā paramarṣiṇā kapilenādividuṣā praṇītā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:10: na khalvamūṣāṃ smṛtīnāṃ manvādismṛtivadanyo 'vakāśaḥ śakyo vaditumṛte mokṣasādhanaprakāśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:14: prasādhitaṃ khalu dharmamīmāṃsāyāṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam'ityatra,
GSP33brsvbh2u:15: yathā śrutiviruddhānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ durbalatayānapekṣaṇīyatvaṃ tasmānna durbalānurodhena balīyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ yuktamupavarṇanam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:16: api tu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvāḥ śrutayo durbalāḥ smṛtīrbādhanta eveti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:31: tāsāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ brahmopādānatvapratipādanaparāṇāṃ tatra tatra darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:32: tasmādavigānācchrauta evārtha āstheyo na tu smārto vigānāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:33: tatkimidānīṃ parasparavigānātsarvā eva smṛtayo 'vaheyā ityata āha-vipratipattau ca smṛtīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:40: kintu viniścatavedaprāmāṇyānāṃ teṣāṃ tadanuṣṭhānavatāṃ prāci bhave 'smiñjanmani siddhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:44: apramāṇena ca na vedārtho 'tiśaṅkituṃ yuktaḥ pramāṇasiddhatvāttasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:45: tadevaṃ vedavirodhe siddhavacanamapramāṇamuktvā siddhānāmapi parasparavirodhe tadvacanādanāśvāsa iti pūrvoktaṃ smārayati-siddhavyapāśrayakalpanāyāmapīti
GSP33brsvbh2u:50: na tāvatsiddhānāṃ parasparaviruddhāni vacāṃsi pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:55: tasmācchutisāmānyamātreṇa bhramaḥ sāṃkhyapraṇetā kapilaḥ śrauta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:58: tataśca teṣāṃ smṛtiḥ kapilasmṛtiviruddhāvaheyetyata āha-bhavati cānyā manoriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:64: bhavatu vedaviruddhaṃ kāpilaṃ vacastathāpi dvayorapi puruṣabuddhiprabhavatayā ko vinigamanāyāṃ heturyato vedavirodhi kāpilaṃ vaco nādaraṇīyamityata āha-vedasya hi nirapekṣamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:65: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-satyaṃ śāstrayonirīśvarastathāpyasya na śāstrakriyāyāmasti svātantryaṃ kapilādīnāmiva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:66: sa hi bhagavān yādṛśaṃ pūrvasmin sarge cakāra śāstraṃ tadanusāreṇāsminnapi sarge praṇītavān /
GSP33brsvbh2u:67: evaṃ pūrvatarānusāreṇa pūrvasmin pūrvatāmanusāreṇa ca pūrvatara ityanādirayaṃ śāstreśvarayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:68: tatreśvarasya na śāstrārthajñānapūrvā śāstrakriyā yenāsya kapilādivatsvātantryaṃ bhavat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:71: śāstraṃ ca svatobodhakatayā puruṣasvātantryābhāvena nirastamastadoṣāśaṅkaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ sākṣādeva svārthe pramāṇam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:75: siddhapramāṇabhāvayānepakṣayaiva śrutyā svārtho viniścāyita iti śīghratarapravṛttayā
GSP33brsvbh2u:80: tadvikārāṇāṃ tu mahadādīnāṃ tānyapi na sandhi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:82: tasmādātyantikāt pramāṇāntarāsaṃvādāt pramāṇamūlatvācca smṛtermūlābhāvādabhāvo vandhyāyā iva dauhitryasmṛteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:84: tasmānna kāpilasmṛteḥ pradhānopādānatvaṃ jagata iti siddham //2//
GSP33brsvbh2u:87: nānena yogaśāstrasya hairaṇyagarbhapātañjalādeḥ sarvathā prāmāṇyaṃ nirākriyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:93: tacca kiñcinnimittīkṛtya vyutpādyamiti pradhānaṃ savikāraṃ nimittīkṛtaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:100: ata eva yogaśāstraṃ vyutpādayitāha sma bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ-'guṇānāṃ paramaṃ rūpaṃ na dṛṣṭipathamṛcchati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:111: yogaśāstrāttu pradhānādisattā vijñāpayiṣyate bahulaṃ hi yogaśāstrāṇāṃ vedena saha saṃvādo dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:119: yathāhuḥ-'prasaraṃ na labhante hi yāvatkvacana markaṭāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:122: seyaṃ labdhaprasarā pradhānādau yogāpramāṇatāpiśācī sarvatraiva durvārā bhavedityasyāḥ prasaraṃ niṣedhatā pradhānādyabhyupeyamiti nāśabdaṃ pradhānamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:135: tā api kasmānna nirākriyanta ityata āha-satīṣvapīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:136: tāsu khalu bahulaṃ vedārthavisaṃvādinīṣu śiṣṭānādṛtāsu kaiścideva tu puruṣāpasadaiḥ paśuprāyairmlecchādibiḥ parigṛhītāsu vedamūlatvāśaṅkaiva nāstīti na nirākṛtāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:137: tadviparītāstu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtaya iti tāḥ pradhānādiparatayā vyudasyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:142: saṃkhyā samyagbuddhirvaidikī tayā vartanta iti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:146: anye 'pi yamaniyamādayo bāhyā āntarāśca dhāraṇādayo yogopāyā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:150: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt / BBs_2,1.4 /
GSP33brsvbh2u:161: tathāpi tarkādare ko heturityata āha-yathā ca śrutīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:162: sāvakāśā bahvayo 'pi śrutayo 'navakāśaikaśrutivirodhe tadanuguṇatayā yathā nīyante
GSP33brsvbh2u:164: api ca brahmasākṣātkāro virodhitayānādimavidyāṃ nivartayan dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa mokṣasādhanamiṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:165: tatra brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣasādhanatayā pradhānasyānumānaṃ dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇādṛṣṭaviṣayaṃ viṣayato 'ntaraṅgaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:168: api ca śrutyāpi brahmaṇi tarka ādṛta ityāha-śrutiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:169: so 'yaṃ brahmaṇo jagadupādānatvākṣepaḥ punastarkeṇa prastūyate-'prakṛtyā saha sārūpyaṃ vikārāṇāmavasthitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:170: jagadbrahmasarūpaṃ ca neti no tasya vikriyā //
GSP33brsvbh2u:173: 'tathāhi-eka eva strīkāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatayā patyuśca sapatnīnāṃ ca caitrasya ca straiṇasya tāmavindato 'paryāyaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviṣādānādhatte
GSP33brsvbh2u:175: tasmātsukhaduḥkhamohātmatayā ca svarganarakādyuccāvacaprapañcatayā ca jagadaśuddhamacetanaṃ ca,
GSP33brsvbh2u:178: tasmātpradhānasyāśuddhasyācetanasya vikāro jaganna tu brahmaṇa iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:179: ye tu cetanabrahmavikāratayā jagaccaitanyamāhustānpratyāha-acetanaṃ cedaṃ jagaditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:190: paramasādhānaṃ tu sūtrāvayavena vaktuṃ tamevāvatārayati-na cetaradapi vilakṣaṇatvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:192: śabdārthāt khalu cetanaprakṛtitvāccaitanyaṃ pṛthivyādīnāmavagamyamānamupodbalitaṃ mānāntareṇa sākṣācchrūyamāṇamapyacaitanyamanyathayet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:202: naitāḥ śrutayaḥ sākṣānmṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāhuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:204: tenaitacchrutibalena na mṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāśaṅkanīyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:207: bhoktṛṇāmupakāryatvādbhūtendriyāṇāṃ copakārakatvāt sāmye ca tadanupapatteḥ sarvajanaprasiddheśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:208: 'vijñānaṃ cābhavat'iti śruteśca viśeṣaścetanācetanalakṣaṇaḥ prāguktaḥ sa nopapadyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:209: devatāśabdakṛto vātra viśeṣo viśeṣaśabdenocyata ityāha-api ca kauṣītakinaḥ prāṇasaṃvāda iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:212: api ca bhūyasyaḥ śrutayaḥ 'agnirvāg bhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśadvāyuḥ prāṇo bhūtvā nāsike prāviśadādityaścakṣurbhūtvākṣiṇī prāviśat'ityādaya indriyaviśeṣagatā devatā darśayanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:215: api ca prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe prāṇānāmasmadādiśarīrāṇāmiva kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitānāṃ vyavahāraṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:216: darśayan prāṇānāṃ kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhānena caitanyaṃ draḍhayatītyāha-prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:218: yadyapi prathame 'dhyāye bhāktatvena varṇitaṃ tathāpi mukhyatayāpi kathañcinnetuṃ śakyamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:223: prakṛtivikārabhāve hetuṃ sārūpyaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati-atyantasārūpye ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:224: prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvahetuṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati-vilakṣaṇatvena ca kāraṇeneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:232: yathā hi kāryatvāviśeṣa'pi 'ārogyakāmaḥ pathyamaśrīyāt' 'svarakāmaḥ sikatāṃ bhakṣayet'ityādīnāṃ mānāntarāpekṣatā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:241: tarko hi pramāṇaviṣayavivecakatayā taditikartavyatābhūtastadāśrayo 'sati pramāṇe 'nugrāhyasyāśrayasyābhāvācchuṣkatayā nādriyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:246: mato hi bhāvyamāno bhāvanāyā viṣayatayānubhūto bhavatīti mananamanubhavāṅgam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:250: api ca cetanakāraṇavādibhiḥ kāraṇasālakṣaṇye 'pi kāryasya kathañciccaitanyāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvābhyāṃ vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavaditi jagatkāraṇe yojayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:253: cetanasya jagatkāraṇasya suṣuptādyavyavasthāsviva sato 'pi caitanyasyānāvirbhāvatayā śakyameva kathañcidavijñānātmatvaṃ yojayitumityāha-yo 'pi cetanakāraṇaśravaṇabaleneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:265: tathā cedaṃ jagatkāryaṃ sattve 'pi cidātmanaḥ kāraṇasya prāgutpatternāsti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:266: nāsti cedasadutpadyata iti satkāryavādavyākopa ityāha-yadi cetanaṃ śuddhamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:271: yathā kāryaṃ svarūpeṇa sadasattvābhyāṃ na nirvacanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:272: api tu kāraṇarūpeṇa śakyaṃ sattvena nirvaktumiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:273: evaṃ ca kāraṇasattaiva kāryasya sattā na tato 'nyeti kathaṃ tadutpatteḥ prāk sati kāraṇe bhavatyasat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:274: svarūpeṇa tūtpatteḥ prāgutpannasya dhvastasya vā sadasattvābhyāmanirvācyasya na sato 'sato votpattiriti nirviṣayaḥ satkāryavādapratiṣedha ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:279: yathā hi yūṣādiṣu hiṅgusaindhavādīnāmavibhāgalakṣaṇo layaḥ svagatarasādibhiryūṣaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:280: rūṣayatyevaṃ brahmaṇi viśuddhyādidharmiṇi jagalliyamānamavibhāgaṃ gacchadbrahma svadharmeṇa rūṣayet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:281: na cānyathā layo lokasiddha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:283: nahi samudrasya phenormibudbudādipariṇāme vā rajjvāṃ sarpadhārādivibhrame vā niyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:293: tatra ca taddharmārūṣaṇe santi sahasraṃ dṛṣṭāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:294: tava tu kāraṇe kāryasya laye kāryadharmarūṣaṇe na dṛṣṭāntalavo 'pyastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:297: yathā rajatasyāropitasya pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ śuktirna ca śuktī rajatamevamidamapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:298: api ca sthityutpattipralayakāleṣu triṣvapi kāryasya kāraṇādabhedamabhidadhatī śrutiranatiśaṅkanīyā sarvaireva vedavādibhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:299: tatra sthityutpattyoryaḥ parihāraḥ sa pralaye 'pi samānaḥ kāryasyāvidyāsamāropitatvaṃ nāma,
GSP33brsvbh2u:311: tattvajñānena ca saśaktino mithyājñānasya samūlaghātaṃ nihatatvāditi //9//
GSP33brsvbh2u:316: nāsmatpakṣa iti yadyapyupariṣṭātpratipādayiṣyāmastathāpi guḍajihvikayā samānatvāpādanamidānīmiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:321: kevalāgamagamyer'the svatantratarkāviṣaye na sāṃkhyādivat sādharmyavaidharmyamātreṇa tarkaḥ pravartanīyo yena pradhānādisiddhirbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:334: api ca yena tarkeṇa tarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhāmāha sa eva tarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito 'bhyupeyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:339: sati caiṣa pūrvapakṣaviṣaye tarke pratiṣṭhārahite pravartate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:348: bhūtārthagocarasya hi samyagjñānasya vyavasthitavastugocaratayā vyavasthānaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:350: vaidikaṃ cedaṃ cetanajagadupādānaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ vedotthatarketikartavyatākaṃ vedajanitaṃ vyavasthitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:351: vedānapekṣeṇa tu tarkeṇa jagatkāraṇabhedamavasthāpayatāṃ tārkikāṇāmanyonyaṃ vipratipattestattvanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvācca na tatastattvavyavastheti na tataḥ samyagjñānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:363: nahi tadeva tadānīmevāsti nāsti ceti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:364: kiṃ cedaṃ maṇimantrauṣadhamindrajālaṃ kāryeṇa śikṣitaṃ yadidamajātāniruddhātiśayamavyavadhānamavidūrasthānaṃ ca tasyaiva tadavasthendriyasya puṃsaḥ kadācitpratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ca,
GSP33brsvbh2u:368: athāpi syāt kāryāntarāṇi piṇḍakapālaśarkarācūrṇakaṇaprabhṛtīni kumbhaṃ vyavadadhate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:371: tasya kāryajātasya kāraṇātmanaḥ sadātanatvena sarvadā vyavadhānena kumbhasyātyantānupalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:380: yasyābhūtvā bhavataḥ samavāyastadupādeyaṃ yatra ca samavāyastadupādānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:384: tasmādyatredamalpatāratamyaṃ viśrāmyati yato na kṣodīyaḥ saṃbhavati tajjagato mūlakāraṇaṃ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:386: tasmāt paramamahato brahmaṇa upādānādabhinnamupādeyaṃ jagatkāryamabhidadhatī śrutiḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:391: tena vaiśeṣikādyabhimatasya tarkasya śuṣkatvenāvyavasthiteḥ sūtramidaṃ sāṃkhyadūṣaṇamatidiśati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:392: yatra kathañcidvedānusāriṇī manvādibhiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ parigṛhītasya sāṃkhyatarkasyaiṣā gatistatra paramāṇvādivādasyātyantavedabāhyasya manvādyupekṣitasya ca kaiva katheti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:394: sṛṣṭyādayo hi vyutpādyāste ca kiñcitsadasadvā pūrvapakṣanyāyotprekṣitamapyudāhṛtya vyutpādyanta iti kenacidaṃśenetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:401: tatkathaṃ punastarkanimitta ākṣepa ityata āha-yadyapi śrutiḥ pramāṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:402: pravṛttā hi śrutiranapekṣatayā svataḥpramāṇatvena na pramāṇāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:418: yadikāraṇāt paramārthabhūtādananyatvamākāśādeḥ prapañcasya kāryasya kutastarhi na vaiśeṣikādyuktadoṣaprapañcāvatāra ityata āha-vyatirekeṇābhāvaḥ kāryasyāvagamyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:424: evaṃ hi brahmavijñānena sarvaṃ jagattattvato jñāyeta yadi brahmaiva tattvaṃ jagato bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:425: yathā rajjvāṃ jñātāyāṃ bhujaṅgatattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:430: mṛdi jñātāyāṃ kathaṃ mṛnmayaṃ ghaṭādi jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:433: na cānyasminvijñāte 'nyadvijñātaṃ bhavatītyata āha śrutiḥ-'vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:437: yathā puruṣasya caitanyamiti rāhoḥ śira iti vikalpamātram /
GSP33brsvbh2u:442: tena mṛdi jñātāyāṃ yeṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva tattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:445: ye hi dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpā na te vastusanto yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikodakādayaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:450: kintu sarvadā sarvatra sarvathāstyeva, na nāsti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:458: nahi rūpaṃ kadācit kvacit kathañcidvā gandho bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:461: tattarhi vikārajātaṃ daṇḍāyamānaṃ sadātanamiti na vikāraḥ kasyacit /
GSP33brsvbh2u:471: athāsyāsattvaṃ nāma kiñcinna jāyate kintu sa eva na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:472: yathāhuḥ-'na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:474: kiṃ tatsvabhāvo bhāva uta bhāvasvabhāvaḥ sa iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:475: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvānāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā tucchatayā jagacchūnyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:478: kalpanāmātranimittatve 'pi niṣedhasya bhāvanityatāpattistadavasthaiva tasmādbhinnamasti kāraṇādvikārajātaṃ na vastu sat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:480: tadanena pramāṇena siddhamanṛtatvaṃ vikārajātasya kāraṇasya nirvācyatayā sattvaṃ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam'ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭāntatayānuvadati śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:481: 'yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ'iti cākṣapādasūtraṃ pramāṇasiddho dṛṣṭānta ityetatparaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:486: anekābhiḥ śaktibhiryāḥ pravṛttayo nānākāryasṛṣṭayastadyuktaṃ brahmaikaṃ nānā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:488: yadi punarekatvameva vastusadbhavet tato nānātvābhāvādvaidikaḥ karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ samasta evocchidyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:490: evaṃ cānekātmakatve brahmaṇo mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā anurūpā bhaviṣyantīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:493: mṛdātmanaikatvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvamiti vadataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparaṃ kimabhedo 'bhimataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:496: tatrābheda aikāntike mṛdātmaneti ca ghaṭaśarāvādyātmaneti collekhadvayaṃ niyamaśca nopapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:503: nahi dharmiṇoḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃkare taddharmāvekatvanānātve na saṃkīryete iti saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:505: evaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvaṃ yāvadbhavati tāvanmṛdātmanā nānātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:514: aṃśo hi saḥ, tasya karmasahitena jñānena brahmabhāva ādhīyata ityata āha-svayaṃ prasiddha hīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:516: yaduktaṃ nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:518: yāvadabādhaṃ hi sarvo 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ svapnadaśāyāmiva tadupadarśitapadārthajātavyavahāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:519: sa ca yathā jāgradavasthāyāṃ bādhakānnivartate evaṃ tattvamasyādivākyaparibhāvanābhyāsaparipākabhuvā śārīrasya brahmātmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇa bādhakena nivartate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:521: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttat kena kaṃ paśyet'ityādinā mithyājñānādhīno vyavahāraḥ kriyākārakādilakṣaṇaḥ samyagjñānenāpanīyata iti na brūte,
GSP33brsvbh2u:524: naca tāvatāsau mithyājñānanibandhano bhavatyevamatrāpītyata āha-na cāyaṃ vyavahārābhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:527: api tu na bhujaṅgo rajjuriyamitivat sadātanaṃ tamabhivadati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:530: nahi jātu kāṣṭhasya daṇḍakamaṇḍalukuṇḍalaśālinaḥ kuṇḍalitvajñānaṃ daṇḍavattāṃ kamaṇḍalumattāṃ bādhate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:538: ekatvaikāntābhyupagame tu teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhedaviṣayāṇāṃ bādhitatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:542: na kevalaṃ vidhiniṣedhākṣepeṇāsya mokṣaśāstrasyākṣepaḥ svarūpeṇāsyāpi bhedāpekṣatvādityāha-mokṣaśāstrasyāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:549: nahi pratyakṣādibhirarthaṃ paricchidya pravartamāno vyavahāre visaṃbādyate sāṃsārikaḥ kaścit /
GSP33brsvbh2u:559: 'kathaṃ cānṛtena mokṣaśāstreṇa'iti yaduktaṃ tadanubhāṣya dūṣayati-kathaṃ tvasatyeneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:565: yatkhalu satyaṃ na tadutpadyata iti kutastasyāsatyādutpādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:567: sāṃvyavahārikaṃ tu satyatvaṃ vṛttirūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasyeva śravaṇādīnāmapyabhinnam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:568: tasmādabhyupetya vṛttisvarūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasya paramārthasatyatāṃ vyabhicārodbhāvanamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:569: yadyapi sāṃvvahārikasya satyādeva bhayātsatyaṃ maraṇamutpadyate tathāpi bhayaheturahistajjñānaṃ vāsatyaṃ tato bhayaṃ satyaṃ jāyata ityasatyātsatyasyotpattiruktā
GSP33brsvbh2u:570: yadyapi cāhijñānamapi svarūpeṇa sattathāpi na tajjñānatvena bhayaheturapi tvanirvācyāhirūṣitatvena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:574: yataḥ samāropitadhūmabhāvāyā dhūmamahiṣyā vahnijñānaṃ satyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:575: nahi cakṣuṣo rūpajñānaṃ satyamupajāyata iti rasādijñānenāpi tataḥ satyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:576: yato niyamo hi sa tādṛśaḥ satyānāṃ yataḥ kutaścit kiñcideva jāyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:580: na cobhayatra dīrghasamāropaṃ prati kaścidasti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:583: yathā sāṃsāriko jāgradbhujaṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyate tataśca na daṃśavedanāmāpnoti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:584: pipāsuḥ salilamālokya pātuṃ pravartate tatastadāsādya pāyaṃpāyamāpyāyitaḥ sukhamanubhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:590: laukiko hi suptotthito 'vagamyaṃ bādhitaṃ manyate na tadavagatiṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:591: tena yadyapi parikṣakā anirvācyarūṣitāmavagatimanirvācyāṃ niścinvanti tathāpi laukikābhiprāyeṇaitaduktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:595: svapne pratibuddho mānuṣīmātmanastanuṃ paśyati tadobhayadehānugatamātmānaṃ pratisaṃdadhāno
GSP33brsvbh2u:605: nahi saṃketayitāraḥ saṃketayantīdṛśena rekhābhedenāyaṃ varṇaḥ pratyetavyo 'pi tvīdṛśo rekhābhedo 'kāraṃ īdṛśaśca kakāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:608: nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:610: yadi khalvekatvānekatvanibandhanau vyavahārāvekasya puṃso 'paryāyeṇa saṃbhavatastatastadarthamubhayasadbhāvaḥ kalpyeta,
GSP33brsvbh2u:621: antyā cediyamavagatirniṣprayojanā tarhi tathā ca na prekṣāvadbhirupādīyeta,
GSP33brsvbh2u:623: nahīyamutpannā satī paścādavidyāṃ nivartayati yena nāntyā syāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:639: anekatvajñānasya ca pratiyogigrahāpekṣayā durbalatvena bādhyatvaṃ vadan prakṛtamupasaṃharati-tasmādantyena pramāṇeneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:647: sākṣātkūṭasthanityatvapratipādikāstu santi sahasraśaḥ śrutaya iti na pariṇāmadharmatā brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:648: atha kūṭasthasyāpi pariṇāmaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-na hyekasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:650: yathaikabāṇāśraye gatinivṛtti evamekasminbrahmaṇi pariṇāmaśca tadabhāvaśca kauṭasthyaṃ bhaviṣyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:654: naca dharmiṇo vyatiricyate dharmo yena tadupajanāpāye 'pi dharmī kūṭasthaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:656: bāṇādayastu pariṇāminaḥ sthityā gatyā ca pariṇamanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:657: api ca svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyāpāditārthavattvasya vedarāśerekenāpi varṇenānarthakena na bhavitavyaṃ kiṃ punariyatā jagato brahmayonitvapratipādakena vākyasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33brsvbh2u:658: tatra phalavadbrahmadarśanasamāmnānasaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ jagadyonitvaṃ samāmnāyamānaṃ tadarthaṃ sattadupāyatayāvatiṣṭhate nārthāntarārthamityāha-naca yathā brahmaṇi iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:660: tadananyatvamityasya sūtrasya pratijñāvirodhaṃ śrutivirodhaṃ ca codayati-kūṭasthabrahmātmavādina iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:663: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ kāryaprapañcastadapekṣatvādaiśvaryasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:664: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na tāttvikamaiśvaryaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ kintvavidyopādhikamiti tadāśrayaṃ pratijñāsūtraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:670: kāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sattā copalambhaśca tasmin kāryasyopalabdherbhāvācca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:674: tathā ca prabhārūpānuviruddhabodhyena cākṣuṣeṇa na vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:686: paṭa iti hi pratyakṣabuddhyā tantava evātānavitānāvasthā ālambyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:690: arthakriyāyāṃ ca pratyekamasamarthā apyanārabhyaivārthāntaraṃ kiñcinmilitāḥ kurvanto dṛśyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:693: naca samavāyādbhinnayorapi bhedānavasāyaḥ anavasāya iti sāṃpratama,
GSP33brsvbh2u:695: bhede hi siddhe samavāyaḥ samavāyācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:699: anayā ca diśā mūlakāraṇaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat,
GSP33brsvbh2u:700: avāntarakāraṇāni ca tanvādayaḥ sarve 'nirvācyā evetyāha-tathā ca tantuṣviti //15//
GSP33brsvbh2u:706: nahi tailaṃ sikatātmanā sikatāyāmasti yathā ghaṭo 'sti mṛdi mṛdātmanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:709: tena yathā sikatāyāstailaṃ na jāyata evamātmano 'pi jaganna jāyeta,
GSP33brsvbh2u:713: yathā hi ghaṭaḥ sarvadā sarvatra ghaṭa eva nā jātvasau kvacitpaṭo bhavatyevaṃ sadapi sarvatra sarvadā sadeva na tu kvacitkadācidasadbhavitumarhatītyupapāditamadhastāt
GSP33brsvbh2u:715: sattvaṃ cet kimato yadyevamityata āha-ekaṃ ca punariti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:718: tataścābhinnasattānanyatvādete api mitho na bhidyete iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:724: abhedagrahasya ca nirapekṣatayā tadanupapatterekaikāśrayatvācca bhedasyaikābhāve tadanupapatterabhedagrahopādānaiva bhedakalpaneti sarvabhavadātam
GSP33brsvbh2u:732: atiśayo hi dharmo nāsatyatiśayavati kārye bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:733: nanu na kāryasyātiśayo niyamaheturapi tu kāraṇasya śaktibhedaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:734: sa cāsatyapi kārye kāraṇasya sattvātsannevetyata āha-śaktiśceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:739: anabhyupagamyamāne casamavāyasya samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhe vicchedaprasaṅgo 'vayavāvayavidravyaguṇādīnāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:743: sattvaṃ tu svabhāvata eva saditi na sattvāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:744: tathā samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbaddhuṃ na saṃbandhāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:747: naca saṃyogasya kāryatvāt kāryasya ca samavāyikāraṇādhīnajanmatvāt asamavāye ca tadanupapatteḥ samavāyakalpanā saṃyoga iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:750: saṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇaḥ samavāyo yathā saṃbandhidvayabhede na bhidyate tannāśe ca na naśyatyapi tu nitya eka evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:753: tathā sati yathaikasmānnimittakāraṇādeva jāyata evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi nimittakāraṇādeva janiṣyata iti samānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:760: atha samastāvayavavyāsaṅgyapi katipayāvayavasthāno grahīṣyata ityata āha-nahi bahutvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:762: bahutvasaṃkhyā hi svarūpeṇaiva vyāsajya saṃkhyeyeṣu vartate ityekamasaṃkhyeyāgrahaṇe 'pi na gṛhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:766: tena yathā sūtramavayavaiḥ kusumāni vyāpnuvanna samastakusumagrahaṇamapekṣate katipayakusumasthānasyāpi tasyopalabdheḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:771: yadyapi gotvasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā anirvācyā na paramārthasantastathā ca kvāsya pratyekaparisamāptiriti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:776: yadyucyeta ghaṭaśabdastadavayaveṣu vyāpārāviṣṭatayā pūrvāparībhāvamāpanneṣu ghaṭopajanābhimukheṣu tādarthyanimittādupacārātprayujyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:777: teṣāṃ ca siddhatvena kartṛtvamastītyupapadyate ghaṭo bhavatīti prayoga ityata āha-ghaṭasya cotpattirucyamāneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:778: utpādanā hi siddhānāṃ kapālakulālādīnāṃ vyāpāro notpattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:783: tatra kapāsakulālādīnāṃ siddhānāmutpādanādhiṣṭhānānāṃ notpattyadhiṣṭhānatvamastīti pāriśeṣyādghaṭa eva sādhya utpatteradhiṣṭhānameṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:785: evañca ghaṭo bhavatīti ghaṭavyāpārasya dhātūpāttatvāttatrāsya kartṛtvamupapadyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:786: taṇḍulānāmiva satāṃ viklittau viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:794: api ca prāgutpatterasattvaṃ kāryasyeti kāryābhāvasya bhāvena maryādākaraṇamanupapannamityāha-abhāvasya ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:796: atyantābhāvasya bandhyāsutasya mā bhūnmaryādanupākhyo hi saḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:797: ghaṭaprāgabhāvasya tu bhaviṣyatā ghaṭenopākhyeyasyāsti maryādetyata āha-yadi vandhyāputraḥ kārakavyāpārāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:798: uktametadadhastādyathā na jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭo bhavatyevamasadapi sanna bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:801: prāk prasiddhamapi kāryaṃ kadācitkāraṇena yojayituṃ vyāpāror'thavānmavedityata āha-tadananyatvācceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:806: evaṃ vastutaḥ kāryatattvaṃ na kāraṇādbhidyate kāraṇasvarūpameva hi tat,
GSP33brsvbh2u:807: anirvācyaṃ tu kāryarūpaṃ bhinnamivābhinnamiva cāvabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:820: iti ca sūtre nigadavyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyāte //19//
GSP33brsvbh2u:824: yadyapi śārīrātparamātmano bhedamāhuḥ śrutayastathāpyabhedamapi darśayanti śrutayo bahvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:838: satyamayaṃ paramātmā sarvajñatvādyathā jīvān vastuta ātmano 'bhinnān paśyati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:839: paśyatyevaṃ na bhāvata eṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāsaṅgostyavidyāvaśāttveṣāṃ tadvadabhimāna iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:840: tathā ca teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāyāmapyahamudāsīna iti na teṣāṃ bandhanāgāraniveśe 'pyastikṣatiḥ kācinmameti na hitākaraṇādidoṣāpattiriti rāddhāntaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:851: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi / BBs_2,1.24 /
GSP33brsvbh2u:852: brahma khalvekamadvitīyatayā parānapekṣaṃ krameṇotpadyamānasya jagato vividhavicitrarūpasyopādānamupeyate tadanupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:860: ekaikaṃ mṛdādi kārakaṃ teṣāṃ tu sāmagryaṃ sādhanam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:864: idaṃ tāvadbhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām-kiṃ tāttvikamasya rūpamapekṣyedamucyate utānādināmarūpabījasahitaṃ kālpanikaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sarvaśaktitvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:865: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe kiṃ nāma tato 'dvitīyādasahāyādupajāyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:867: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:870: te 'pi hi bāhyacetanādikāraṇānapekṣā eva kālaparivaśena svata eva pariṇāmāntaramāsādayanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:874: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ ti maheśvaram'iti kāryakrameṇa tatparipāko 'pi kramavānunneyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:878: yadi tu cetanatve satīti viśeṣaṇānna kṣīrādibhirvyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:886: nanu na brahmaṇastattvataḥ pariṇāmo yena kārtsnyabhāgavikalpenākṣipyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:887: avidyākalpitena tu nāmarūpalakṣaṇena rūpabhedena vyākṛtāvyākṛtātmanā tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyena pariṇāmādivyavahārāspadatvaṃ brahma pratipadyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:889: nahi candramasi taimirikasya dvitvakalpanā candramaso dvitvamāvahati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:896: pakṣo na ghaṭayituṃ śakyata ityapabādhyaśrutestu śabdāmūlatvāt ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:897: hi'iti sūtrābhyāṃ vivartadṛḍhīkaraṇenaikāntikādvayalakṣaṇaḥ śrutyarthaḥ pariśodhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:907: svapnadṛgātmā hi manasaiva svarūpānupamardena rathādīn sṛjati //28//
GSP33brsvbh2u:912: yadyapi samudāyaḥ sāvayavastathāpi pratyekaṃ sattvādayo niravayavāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:913: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sattvamātraṃ pariṇamate na rajastamasī iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:922: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sa eva tadānīṃ tatra vartate na vartate ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:923: tathā coparyadhaḥpārśvasthāḥ ṣaḍapi paramāṇavaḥ samānadeśā iti prathimānupapatteraṇumātraḥ piṇḍaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:929: paramārthatastu bhāvikaṃ pariṇāmaṃ vā kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ vecchatāmeṣa durvāro doṣo na punarasmākaṃ māyāvādināmityāha-parihṛtastviti //29//
GSP33brsvbh2u:935: vikaraṇatvān neti cet tad uktam / BBs_2,1.31 /
GSP33brsvbh2u:936: kulālādibhyastāvadbāhyakaraṇāpekṣebhyo devādīnāṃ bāhyanapekṣāṇāmāntarakaraṇāpekṣasṛṣṭhīnāṃ pramāṇena dṛṣṭo yathā viśeṣo nāpahnotuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:938: evaṃ sarvaśakteḥ parasyā devatāyā āntarakaraṇānapekṣāyā jagatsarjanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na sāmānyato dṛṣṭamātreṇāpahnavamarhatīti //31//
GSP33brsvbh2u:944: prekṣāvataśca pravṛttiḥ svaparahitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā satī nāprayojanālpāyāsāpi saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:952: tasmāt prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā tadabhāve 'nupapannā brahmopādānatāṃ jagataḥ pratikṣipatīti prāptam //32//
GSP33brsvbh2u:956: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:961: anyathā 'na kurvīta vṛthā ceṣṭām'iti dharmasūtrakṛtāṃ pratiṣedho nirviṣayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:964: api cādṛṣṭahetukotpattikī śvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇā prekṣāvatāṃ kriyā prayojanānusaṃdhānamantareṇa dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:970: līlāmātrātsatyapyanuniṣpādini prayojane naiva taduddeśena pravṛttirevaṃ brahmaṇo
GSP33brsvbh2u:972: dṛṣṭaṃ ca yadalpabalavīryabuddhināmaśakyamatiduṣkaraṃ vā tadanyeṣāmanalpabalavīryabuddhīnāṃ suśakamīṣatkaraṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:975: na cāyaṃ na pītaḥ saṃkṣipya culukena helayeva kalaśayoninā mahāmuninā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:976: na cādyāpi na dṛśyante līlāmātravinirmitāni mahāprāsādapramadavanāni śrīmannṛganarendrāṇāmanyeṣāṃ manasāpi duṣkarāṇi nareśvarāṇam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:977: tasmādupapannaṃ yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvādvā līlayā vā jagatsarjanaṃ bhagavato maheśvarasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:978: api ca neyaṃ pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiryenānuyujyeta prayojanam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:980: avidyā ca svabhāvata eva kāryonmukhī na prayojanamapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:983: sā ca caitanyacchuritā jagadutpādaheturiti cetano jagadyonirākhyāyata ityāha-na ceyaṃ paramārthaviṣayeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:984: api ca na brahma jagatkāraṇamapi tattayā vivakṣantyāgamā api tu jagati brahmātmabhāvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:985: tathā ca sṛṣṭeravivakṣāyāṃ tadāśrayo doṣo nirviṣaya evetyāśayenāha-brahmātmabhāveti //33//
GSP33brsvbh2u:987: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,1.34 /
GSP33brsvbh2u:992: nahi sabhyaḥ sabhāyāṃ niyukto yuktavādinaṃ yuktavādyasīti cāyuktavādinamayuktavādyasīti bruvāṇa,
GSP33brsvbh2u:993: sabhāpatirvā yuktavādinamanugṛhṇannayuktavādinaṃ ca nigṛhṇannanukto dviṣṭo vā bhavatyapi tu madhyastha iti vītarāgadveṣa iti cākhyāyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:994: tadvadīśvaraḥ puṇyakarmāṇamanugṛhṇannapuṇyakarmāṇaṃ ca nigṛhṇanmadhyastha eva nāmadhyasthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:998: ata eva na nairghṛṇyamapi saṃharataḥ samastān prāṇabhṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1003: na ca 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate eṣa evāsādhu karma
GSP33brsvbh2u:1004: kārayati taṃ yamadho niniṣate'iti śruterīśvara eṣa dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ sādhvasādhunī
GSP33brsvbh2u:1005: karmaṇī kārayitvā svargaṃ narakaṃ vā lokaṃ nayati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1008: yasmāt karma kārayitveśvaraḥ prāṇinaḥ sukhaduḥkhinaḥ sṛjati iti śruteravagamyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1010: naca vaiṣamyamātramatra brūmo na tvīśvarakāraṇatvaṃ vyāsedhāma iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1012: tasmādīśvarasya savāsanakleśāparāmarśamabhivadantīnāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāmanugrahāyonninīṣate 'dho ninīṣata ityetadapi tajjātīyapūrvakarmābhyāsavaśātprāṇina ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1018: tathā ca māyākārasyevāṅgasākalyavaikalyabhedena vicitrān prāṇino darśayato na vaiṣamyadoṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1020: evamasyāpi bhagavato vividhavicitraprapañcamanirvācyaṃ viśvaṃ darśayataḥ saṃharataśca svabhāvādvā līlayā vā na kaściddoṣaḥ //34//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1023: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvād / BBs_2,1.35 /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1029: akṛte karmaṇi puṇye pāpe vā tatphalaṃ bhoktāramadhyāgacchet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1036: sa ca rāgādibhiḥ sahitaḥ svakāryairna śarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhabhogāyatanamantareṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1039: naca pūrvaśarīramantareṇa mohādiriti pūrvapūrvaśarīrāpekṣo mohādirevaṃ pūrvapūrvamohādyapekṣaṃ pūrvapūrvaśarīramityanāditaivātra bhagavatī cittamanākulayati
GSP33brsvbh2u:1041: rāgādveṣamohā rāgādayasta eva hi puruṣaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhamanubhāvya kleśayantīti kleśāsteṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1042: vāsanāḥ karmapravṛttyanuguṇāstābhirākṣiptāni pravarttitāni karmāṇi tadapekṣā layalakṣaṇā avidyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1046: tadevamanāditve siddhe 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam'iti prāk sṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāraṇaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1051: dṛśyate sarvasya cetanādhiṣṭhitasyaiva loke pravṛttiriti lokānusāro darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1056: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrikabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1057: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyāyogakāraṇadādismṛtibhiḥ sāṃkhyādiprayuktatarkaiśca vedāntasamanvayavirodhaparihārākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsvbh2u:1062: iha hi pāde svatantrā vedanirapekṣāḥ pradhānādisiddhiviṣayāḥ sāṃkhyādiyuktayo nirākariṣyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1064: nahīdaṃ śāstramucchṛṅkhalatarkaśāstravatpravṛttamapi tu vedāntavākyāni brahmaparāṇīti pūrvapakṣottarapakṣābhyāṃ viniścetum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1070: na caitadeva cetanopādānamacetanopādānaṃ ceti samuccetuṃ śakyaṃ, virodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1071: na ca vyavasthite vastuni vikalpo yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1074: tasmāttadvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvayo vedāntānāṃ sidhyatīti na tatastattvajñānaṃ seddhumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1075: naca tattvajñānādṛte mokṣa iti svatantrāṇāmapyanumānānāmābhāsīkaraṇamiha śāstresaṃgatameveti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1076: yadyevaṃ tataḥ parakīyānumānanirāsa eva kasmātprathamaṃ na kṛta ityata āha--vedāntārthanirṇayasya ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1082: naca parapakṣadūṣaṇamantareṇa tattvanirṇayaḥ śakyaḥ kartumiti tatvanirṇayāya vītarāgeṇāpi parapakṣo dūṣyate na tu parapakṣatayeti na vītarāgakathātvavyāhatirityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1085: yāni hi yena rūpeṇā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyātsamanvīyante tāni tatkaraṇāni dṛṣṭāni,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1086: yathā ghaṭādayo rucakādayaścā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyānmṛtsuvarṇānvitāstatkaraṇāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1087: tathā cedaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ ca bhāvajātaṃ suḥkhaduḥkhamohātmanānvitamupalabhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1091: yā ca mohātmatā tattama iti traiguṇyakāraṇasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1099: caitrasya tu straiṇasya tāmavindato moho viṣādaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1104: tacca triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ pradhīyate kriyate 'nena jagaditi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1106: tacca mṛtsuvarṇavadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣasya bhogāpavargalakṣaṇamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1108: tathā hyāhuḥ---'puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1113: yadi tāvadacetanaṃ pradhānamanadhiṣṭhitaṃ cetanena pravartate svabhāvata eveti sādhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1118: tasmāt kṛtakatvamiva nityatvasādhanayā prayuktaṃ sādhyaviruddhena vyāptaṃ viruddham,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1119: evaṃ samanvayādi cetanānadhiṣṭhitatve sādhya iti racanānupapatteriti darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1127: sa ca svabhāvapratibandhaḥ śaṅkitasamāropitopādhinirāse sati niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1132: evamapi cetanaprayuktatvaṃ nābhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇāntaravirodho bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1135: āntarāḥ khalvamī suḥkhaduḥkhamohaviṣādā bāhyebhyaścandanādibhyo 'tivicchinnapratyayapravedanīyebhyo vyatiriktā adhyakṣamīkṣyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1136: yadi punareta eva suḥkhaduḥkhādisvabhāvā bhaveyustataḥsvarūpatvādhemante 'pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1140: evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya sukha iti manuṣyādīnāmapi prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1143: tasmādasukhādisvabhāvā api candanakuṅkumādayo jātikālāvasthādyapekṣayā sukhaduḥkhādihetavo na tu svayaṃ sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1144: tasmātsukhādirūpasamanvayo bhāvānāmasiddha iti nānena tadrūpaṃ kāraṇamavyaktamunnīyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1151: saṃsargapūrvakatve hi saṃsargasyaikasminnadvaye 'saṃbhavānnānātvaikārthasamavetasya nānākaraṇāni saṃsṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāni,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1156: atha na yojanādimitatvaṃ parimāṇamiyattāṃ nabhaso brūmaḥ kintvavyāpitām,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1162: nahi yathā taiḥ kāryajātamāviṣṭamevaṃ tāni parasparaṃ viśanti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1167: evaṃ citiśaktirapi guṇairasaṃsṛṣṭeti sāpi parimitetyanaikāntikatvaṃ parimitatvasya hetoriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1171: na kevalaṃ racanābhedā na cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa bhavantyapi tu sāmyāvasthāyāḥ pracyutirvaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1174: evaṃ hi guṇapradhānabhāve satyasya mahadādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1176: na hi cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa mṛtpiṇḍe pradhāne 'ṅgabhāvena cakradaṇḍasalilasūtrādayo 'vatiṣṭhante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1177: tasmātpravṛtterapi cetanādhiṣṭhānasiddhiriti 'śaktitaḥ pravṛtteśca'ityayamapi hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyo viruddha evetyuktaṃ vakroktyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1179: ayamabhiprāyaḥ--tvayā kilaupaniṣadenāsmaddhetūn dūṣayitvā kevalasya cetanasyaivānyanirapekṣasya jagadupādānatvaṃ nimittatvaṃ ca samarthanīyam
GSP33brsvbh2u:1182: aupaniṣadastu cetanahetukāṃ tāvadeṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttimabhyupagacchatu paścāt svapakṣamata eva samādhāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānāha--satyametat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1186: acetanāśrayaiva sarvā pravṛttirdṛśyate na tu cetanāśrayā kācidapi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1190: na tāvaccetanaḥ pravṛtyāśrayatayā tatprayojakatayā vā pratyakṣamīkṣyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1193: sadbhāvamātraṃ tu tatra cetanasya gamyate rathādivailakṣaṇyājjīvaddehasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1195: mā bhūdākāśa utpattimatāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇamasti hi sarvatreti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1196: tadanena dehātirikte satyapi cetane tasya na pravṛttiṃ prati nimittabhāvo 'stītyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1197: yataścāsya na pravṛttihetubhāvo 'sti ata eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛttidarśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamiti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1198: tathā ca na cidātmanimittā pravṛttiriti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1199: tasmānna racanāyāḥ pravṛttervā cidātmakāraṇatvasiddhirjagata iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati--tadabhidhīyate--na brūma iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1200: na tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamasiddhaḥ śārīro vā paramātmā vāsmābhiridānīṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1203: tatra mṛtaśarīre vā rathādau vānadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteradarśanāt tadviparyaye ca pravṛttidarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cetanahetukatvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1208: dehaḥ svayaṃ cetanaḥ karacaraṇādimān svavyāpāreṇa pravartayatīti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1209: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kūṭasthanityaścetano vyāpārarahito jñānaikasvabhāvaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt pravartako yukta iti codayati--nanu taveti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1213: sāṃkhyānāṃ hi svadeśasthā rūpādaya indriyaṃ vikurvate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1214: tena tadindrayamarthaṃ prāptamarthākāreṇa pariṇamata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1216: yeṣāmacetanaṃ cetanaṃ cāsti teṣāmetadyujyate vaktuṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ pravartata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1219: teṣāṃ pravartyābhāve kaṃ prati pravartakatvaṃ cetanasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1221: kāraṇabhūtayā layalakṣaṇayāvidyayā prāksargopacitena ca vikṣepasaṃskāreṇa yat pratyupasthāpitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tadeva māyā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1223: etaduktaṃ bhavati--neyaṃ sṛṣṭirvastusatī yenādvaitino vastusato dvitīyasyābhāvādanuyujyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1224: kālpanikyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvasti kālpanikaṃ dvitīyaṃ sahāyaṃ māyāmayam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1233: yathā payombunoścetanānadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svata eva pravṛttirevaṃ pradhānasyāpīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1240: na ca sapakṣeṇa vyabhicāra iti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1244: iha tu sarvasya cetanāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyata iti kuto na virodha ityata āha--upasaṃhāradarśanāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1245: sthūladarśilokābhiprāyānurodhena taduktaṃ na tu paramārthata ityarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1248: yadyapi sāṃkhyānāmapi vicitrakarmavāsanāvāsitaṃ pradhānaṃ sāmyāvasthāyāmapi tathāpi na karmavāsanāḥ sargasyeśate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1249: kintu pradhānameva svakārye pravartamānamadharmapratibaddhaṃ sanna sukhamayīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumutsahata iti dharmeṇādharmapratibandho 'panīyate
GSP33brsvbh2u:1253: tataśca pratibandakāpanayasādhane dharmādharmavāsane api saṃnihite ityāgantorapekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt sadaiva sāmyena pariṇameta vaiṣamyeṇa vā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1255: īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvavaicitryādvā karmaparipākāpekṣasya pravṛttinivṛttī
GSP33brsvbh2u:1259: dhenūpayuktaṃ hi tṛṇapallavādi yathā svabhāvata eva cetanānapekṣaṃ kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenūcaitanyamapekṣyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1261: evaṃ pradhānamapi svabhāvata eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtamatra cetaneneti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1262: dhenūpayuktasya tṛṇādeḥ kṣīrabhāve kiṃ nimittāntaramātraṃ niṣidhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1266: buddhipūrvakārī tu tatrāpīśvara eva sarvajñaḥ saṃbhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1274: na kevalaṃ tāttviko bhogo 'nādheyātiśayasya kūṭasthanityasya puruṣasya na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1276: yena hi prayojanena pradhānaṃ pravartitaṃ tadanena kartavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1280: citeḥ sadā viśuddhatvānnaitasyāṃ jātu karmānubhavavāsanāḥ santi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1282: tathā ca pradhānapravṛtteḥ prāk citirmuktaiveti nāpavargārthamapi tatpravṛttiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1288: bhogasya ca sakṛcchabdādyupalabghimātrādeva samāptatvānna tadarthaṃ punaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartetetyayatnasādhyo mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1291: atha puruṣārthāya pravṛttaṃ kimarthaṃ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiṃ karoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1293: hantāyāṃ sakṛcchabdādyupabhogena kṛtaprayojanasya pradhānasya nivṛttimātrādeva sidhyatīti kṛtaṃ sattvānyatākhyātipratīkṣaṇena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1296: tasmādubhayārthamapi na pradhānasya pravṛttirupapadyata iti siddhor'thābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1304: sā ca sarjanīyamantareṇānarthikā syāditi yatpradhānena śabdādi sṛjyate tadeva dṛkśakterdṛśyaṃ bhavatīti tadubhayārthavatvāya sarjanamiti śaṅkārthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1306: yathā hi pradhānasya sargaśaktirekaṃ puruṣaṃ prati caritārthāpi puruṣāntaraṃ prati pravartate 'nucchedāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1307: evaṃ dṛkśaktirapi taṃ puruṣaṃ pratyarthavattvāyānucchedātsarvadā pravartetetyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1308: sakṛddṛśyadarśanena vā caritārthatve na bhūyaḥ pravarteteti sarveṣāmekapade nirmokṣaḥ prasajyeteti sahasā saṃsāraḥ samucchidyeteti //6//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1313: puruṣa eva dṛkśaktisampannaḥ paṅguriva pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ pradhānamandhamiva pravartayiṣyatīti śaṅkā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1323: yathāhuḥ--'nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1331: anapekṣasya svato vāpi vaiṣamye na kadācitsāmyaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1335: aṅgitvānupapattilakṣaṇo doṣastāvanna bhavadbhiḥ śakyaḥ parihartumiti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1353: tathā ca tapyena karmaṇā tāpakasamavetakriyāphalaśālinā tāpakādanyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1355: anyatve tu tapyasya tāpakāccaitrasamavetagamanakriyāphalabhājo gamyasyeva nagarasya tapyatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1358: nahi svabhāvādbhāvo viyojituṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1359: jaladheśca vīcitaraṅgaphenādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ santa āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmāṇo na tu tairjaladhiḥ kadācidapi mucyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1380: tathāpi yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yodheṣu vartamānaḥ prādhānyātsvāminyapadiśyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1388: tāpo hi sāṃvyavahārika eva na pāramārthika ityasakṛdāveditam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1389: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvanyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātāmityasmadabhyupagama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1390: sāṃkhyo 'pi hi bhedāśrayaṃ tapyatāpakabhāvaṃ bruvāṇo na puruṣasya tapikarmatāmākhyātumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1394: darśitaviṣayattvāttu buddhisatve tapye tadavibhāgāpatyā puruṣo 'pyanutapyata iva na tu tapyate 'pariṇāmitvādityuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1400: sahādarśanena nimittena vartata iti sanimittaḥ saṃyogastadapekṣatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1405: tasya ca buddhisatvasya tāmasaviparyāsādātmanaḥ puruṣādbhedamapaśyataḥ puruṣastapyata ityabhimānaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1407: tasya tu buddhisatvasya sāttvikyā vivekakhyātyā tāmasīyamavivekakhyātirnivartanīyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1409: tathā vicchinnāpi chinnabadarīva punastamasodbhūtena sattvamabhibhūya vivekakhyātimapodya śataśikharāvidyāvirbhāvyeteti bateyamapavargakathā tapasvino dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1414: atha tasmin pratibimbe malinādarśopadhānānmalinatā padaṃ labhate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1415: tathā cātmano malinaṃ mukhaṃ paśyan devadattastapyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1416: yadā tūpādhyapanayādbimbameva kalpanāvaśāt pratibimbaṃ taccāvadātamiti tattvamavagacchati tadāsya tāpaḥ praśāmyati naca malinaṃ me mukhamiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1417: evamavidyopadhānakalpitāvacchedo jīvaḥ paramātmapratibimbakalpaḥ kalpitaireva śabdādibhiḥ saṃparkāttapyate natu tattvataḥ paramātmano 'sti tāpaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1421: cāsya punaḥ saṃsārabhayamasti taddhetoravāstavatvena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1425: yathaiva pradhānakāraṇavādo brahmakāraṇavādavirodhyevaṃ paramāṇukāraṇavādo 'pyataḥ so 'pi nirākartavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1426: 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ'ityasya prapañca ārabhyate--tatra vaiśeṣikā brahmakāraṇatvaṃ dūṣayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1437: tasya tu sāvayavatve 'bhyupagamyamāne 'nantāvayavatvena sumerurājasarṣapayoḥ samānaparimāṇatvaprasaṅga ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1440: bahavastu paramāṇavaḥ saṃyuktā na sahasā sthūlamārabhante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1443: yadi hi ghaṭopagṛhītāḥ paramāṇavo ghaṭamārabheran na ghaṭe pravibhajyamāne kapālaśarkarādyupalabhyeta,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1446: tathā sati mudgaraprahārāt ghaṭavināśe na kiñcidupalabhyeta,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1450: tasmānna bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ dravyaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇatvam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1456: tadapi hi dvyaṇukameva bhavenna tu mahat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1465: tathā ca puruṣopabhogātiśayābhāvādadṛṣṭanimittatvācca viśvanirmāṇasya bhogārtatvāttatkāraṇena ca dvyaṇukena tanniṣpatteḥ kṛtaṃ dvyaṇukāśrayeṇa dvyaṇukāntareṇetyārambhavaiyarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1466: ārambhārthavattvāya bahubhireva dvyaṇukaistryaṇukaṃ caturaṇuṇaṃ vā dravyaṃ mahaddīrghamārabdhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1469: tryaṇukādibhirārabdhaṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇabahutvādvā kāraṇamahatvādvā kāraṇapracayabhedādvā mahadbhavatīti prakriyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1470: tadetayaiva prakriyayā kāraṇasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyameva guṇāntaramārabhanta iti dūṣaṇamadūṣaṇīkriyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1474: yathā mahad dravyaṃ tryaṇukādi hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1477: yathā vā tadeva tryaṇukādi dīrdhaṃ hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1481: yathā dvyaṇukamaṇu hṛsvaparimāṇaṃ parimaṇḍalāt paramāṇoraparimaṇḍalaṃ jāyata evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jaganniṣpadyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1484: na dvyaṇuke 'ṇutvamapi pāramāṇuvarti pārimāṇḍalyamārabhate, tasya hi
GSP33brsvbh2u:1487: yadāhi dve dve dvyaṇuke iti paṭhitavye pramādādekaṃ dvepadaṃ na paṭhitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1489: itarathā hi dvyaṇukameva tadapi syānna tu mahadityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1494: tadevaṃ yojanīyam--dvyaṇukādhikaraṇe ye dvitve te yadā caturaṇukamārabhete saṃkhyeyānāṃ caturṇāṃ dvyaṇukānāmārambhakatvāttattadgate dvitvasaṃkhye api ārambhike ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1495: evaṃ vyavasthitāyāṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyāyāṃ taddūṣaṇasya vyabhicāra uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1496: athāvyavasthitā tathāpi tadavastho vyabhicāra ityāha--yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇava iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1497: nāṇu jāyate no hṛsvaṃ jāyate iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1500: kāraṇagatā guṇā na kārye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhanta ityetāvataiveṣṭasiddhau na tadhetvanusaraṇe khedanīyaṃ mana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1501: api ca satparimāṇāntaramākrāmati notpatteśca prāk parimāṇāntaraṃ saditi kathamākrāmet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1505: naca kāraṇabahutvādīnāṃ saṃnidhānamasaṃnidhānaṃ ca pārimāṇḍalyasyetyāha--naca parimāṇāntarārambhe iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1516: paramāṇūnāmādyasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇābhyupagame 'nabhyupagame vā na karmātastadabhāvastasya dvyaṇukādikrameṇa sargasyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1520: athavā saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthamubhayathāpi na karmātaḥ sargahetoḥ saṃyogasyābhāvāt pralayahetorvibhāgasyābhāvāttadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1531: gurutvadravatve ca paramāṇugate sadātane iti karmasātatyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1539: yadyapi paramāṇukṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogaḥ paramāṇukarmajastathāpi tatpravāhasya sātatyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1541: ekadeśena hi saṃyoge yāvaṇvorekadeśau nirantarau tābhyāmanye ekadeśāḥ saṃyogenāvyāptā iti prathamopapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1542: sarvātmanā tu nairantarye paramāṇāvekasmin paramāṇvāntarāṇyapi saṃmāntīti na prathamā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1548: nahyasti saṃbhavo niravayava ekastadaiva tenaiva saṃyuktaścāsaṃyuktaśceti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1555: nanvabhighātanodanādayaḥ pralayārambhasamaye kasmādvibhāgārambhakakarmahetavo na saṃbhavantyata āha--nahi tatrāpi kiñcinniyatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1560: yadyapi śarīrādipralayārambhe 'sti duḥkhabhogastathāpyasau pṛthivyādipralaye nāstītyabhipretyedamuditamiti mantavyam //12//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1564: na tāvat svatantraḥ samavāyo 'tyantaṃ bhinnaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ samavāyinau ghaṭayitumarhatyatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1567: athāsau saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandhe na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate saṃbandhisaṃbandhanaparamārthatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1569: na ca tasmin sati samabanghināvasaṃbanghinau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1576: naca tasmin sati saṃyogināvasaṃyoginau bhavata iti tulyacarcaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1581: yadyasamavāye 'syāguṇatvaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu na naḥ kācitkṣatiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1584: tacca vināpi samavāyaṃ svarūpataḥ saṃyogasyopapadyata eva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1587: api ca samavāyasyāpi saṃbandhyadhīnasadbhāvasya saṃbandhinaścaikasya dvayorvā vināśitvena vināśitvātkāryatvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1588: nahyasti saṃbhavo guṇo vā guṇaguṇinau vāvayavo vāvayavāvayavinau vā na sto 'pyasti ca tayoḥ saṃbandha iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1590: tathā ca yathaiṣa nimittakāraṇamātrādhīnotpāda evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1591: atha samavāyo 'pi samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇe apekṣate tathāpi saivānavastheti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1597: tasmātsaṃyogaḥ saṃyoginoḥ samavāyena saṃbaddha iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1606: yat kila bhūtabhautikānāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ tadrūpādimān paramāṇurnitya iti bhavadbhirabhyupeyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1611: tadanena prasaṅgena jagatkāraṇaprasiddhaye pravṛttaṃ sādhanaṃ rūpādimannityaparamāṇusiddheḥ pracyāvya brahmagocaratāṃ nīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1613: paramāṇunityatvasādhanāni ca teṣāmupanyasya dūṣayati--yacca nityatve kāraṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1623: vyapadeśasya ca pratītipūrvakasya tadabhāve nirmūlasyāpi darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1626: yadi satāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ paridṛśyamānasthūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇāgrahaṇamavidyā tayā nityatvam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1628: athādravyatve satīti viśeṣyetatathā sati na dvyaṇuke vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1633: api cādravyatve sati sattvādityata eveṣṭārthasiddheravidyeti vyartham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1642: yadi hi saṃyogasacivāni bahūni dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabheranniti prakriyā sidhyet sidhyet dravyadvayameva(?)
GSP33brsvbh2u:1646: na tāvat tantvādhārastadvyatiriktaḥ paṭo nāmāsti yaḥ saṃyogasacivaistantubhirārabhyetetyuktamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1650: tathāhi--mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā sarveṣu ghaṭarucakādiṣvanugataṃ sāmānyamanubhūyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1651: na caite ghaṭarucakādayo mṛtsuvarṇābhyāṃ vyatiricyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1653: tasmānmṛtsuvarṇe eva tena tenākāreṇa pariṇamamāne ghaṭa iti ca rucaka iti ca kapālaśarkarākaṇamiti ca śakalakaṇikācūrṇamiti ca vyākhyāyete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1655: na tu ghaṭādayo vā kapālādiṣu kapālādayo vā ghaṭādiṣu ca rucakādayo vā śakalādiṣu śakalādayo vā rucakādiṣu pratyabhijñāyante yatra kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1656: na ca vinaśyantameva ghaṭakṣaṇaṃ pratītya kapālakṣaṇo 'nupādāna evotpadyate tatkimupādānapratyabhijñāneneti vaktavyam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1660: evaṃ vyavasthite yathā suvarṇadravyaṃ kāṭhinyāvasthāmapahāya dravāvasthayā pariṇataṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1661: na ca tatrāvayavavibhāgaḥ sannapi dravatve kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1665: evaṃ mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ piṇḍivasthāmapahāya kulālahemakārādi vyāpārādghaṭarucakīdyavasthāmāpadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1672: tasmātsāmānyasya paramārthasato 'nirvācyā viśeṣāvasthāstadadhiṣṭhānā bhujaṅgādaya iva rajjvādyupādānāṃ upajanāpāyadharmāṇa iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1684: triguṇastu tato vahniḥ sa śabdasparśavān bhavet //2//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1685: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca rasamātraṃ samāviśat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1690: śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca viśeṣāstena te smṛtāḥ //5//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1693: tathā ca yathāyathā saṃhanyamānānāmupacayastathātathā saṃhatasya sthaulyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1696: astu tāvacchabdo vaiśeṣikaistasya pṛthivyādiguṇatvenānabhyupagamāditi catvāri bhūtāni catustridvyekaguṇānyudāhṛtavān /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1703: yastu brūte na gandhādisaṃghātaḥ paramāṇurapi tu gandhādyāśrayo dravyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1708: natāvat paramāṇavo rūpato gṛhyante kintu kāryadvārā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1710: yadā na tadādhāratayā gṛhyate 'pi tu tadātmakatayā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1711: tathā ca teṣāmupacaye tadupacitaṃ dṛṣṭamiti paramāṇubhirapi tatkāraṇairevaṃ bhavitavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1720: saṃpratyutsūtraṃ bhāṣyakṛdvaiśeṣikatantraṃ dūṣayati-api ca vaiśeṣikā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1722: na hi yathā gavāśvamahiṣamātaṅgāḥ parasparānadhīnanirūpaṇāḥ svatantrā nirūpyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1723: vanhyādyanadhīnotpattayo vā dhūmādayo yathā vanhyādyanadhīnanirūpaṇāḥ svatantrā nirūpyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1725: api tu yadā yadā nirūpyante tadā tadā tadākāratayaiva prathante na tu prathāyāmeṣāmasti svātantryaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1726: tasmānnātiricyante dravyādapi tu dravyameva sāmānyarūpaṃ tathā tathā prathata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1732: yatra hi dvāvākāriṇau vibhinnābhyāmākārābhyāmavagamyete tau saṃbaddhāsaṃbaddhau vā vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratibhāsete,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1740: yadi tu saṃyoginoḥ kāryayoḥ saṃbandhibhyāmanyadeśatve yutasiddhistato 'nyāyutasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1742: tathā cākāśaparamāṇvoḥ paramāṇvośca saṃyuktayoryutasiddhiḥ siddhā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1755: evaṃ lakṣaṇe 'pi hi samavāye guṇaguṇinorabhyupagamyamāne saṃbaddhe iti pratyayaḥ syānna tādātmyapratyayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1757: sa cedāsthito 'pi na pratyayamimamupapādayet kṛtaṃ tatkalpanayā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1761: hi paṭe śukla ityevamākaraḥ syānna tu paṭaḥ śukla iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1764: nahyagnirmāṇavaka ityupacaritāgnibhāvo māṇavakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dahanātmanā prathate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1766: guṇādisadbhāve tadbhede ca pratyakṣānubhavādanyasya pramāṇasyābhāvāttasya ca bhrāntatve sarvābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1775: saṃbandhidvayādhīnasadbhāvo hi saṃbandho nāsatyekasminnapi saṃbandhini bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1776: naca samavāyo nityaḥ svatantra iti coktamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1778: evaṃ hi sati samavāyasya nityatvābhyupagamāt kāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1779: utpattau ca samavāyasya saiva kāryasyāstu kiṃ samavāyena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1783: kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyate itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1796: saṃyogajo 'pi hi saṃyogo bhavadbhirabhyupeyate na kriyāja evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1800: api ca saṃbandhirūpātirikte saṃbandhe siddhe tadavāntarabhedāya lakṣaṇabhedo 'nuśrīyeta sa eva tu saṃbandhyatirikto 'siddhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1801: uktaṃ hi parastādatiriktaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandho 'saṃbaddho na saṃbandhinau ghaṭayitumiṣṭe /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1805: tasmāt kāryasya kāraṇādanatirekān kiṃ kena saṃbaddhaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1806: saṃyogasya ca saṃyogibhyāmanatirekāt kastayoḥ saṃyoga ityāha--nāpi saṃyogasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1814: parāpekṣayā tu pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1828: kiñcānyat dvābhyāmaṇubhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ sāvayavasya kāryasyadvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1829: saṃśleṣaḥ saṃgraho yata ekasaṃbandhyākarṣe saṃbandhyantarākarṣo bhavati tasyānupapattiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1830: ata eva saṃyogādanyaḥkāryakāraṇadravyayorāśrayāśritabhāvo 'nyathā nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaḥ samavāya iti cet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1844: kiṃ sūkṣmatvāt paramāṇavo na vinaśyantyatha niravayavatayā tatra pūrvasmin kalpe idamuktam--vastubhūtāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1851: api tu saṃyuktā eva santaḥ paraṃ prathanena nudyamānā adhikadeśavyāpakā bhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1852: evamagnisaṃyogena suvarṇadravyāvayavāḥ saṃyuktā eva santo dravībhāvamāpadyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1857: evamantareṇāpyavayavasaṃyogavināśaṃ paramāṇavo vinaṅkṣyantyanye cotpatsyanta iti sarvamavadātam //17//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1863: te hi paramāṇvākāśādikkālātmamanasāṃ ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcinnityatvamabhyupetya śeṣāṇāṃ niranvayavināśamupayanti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1865: tena tadupanyāso vaināśikatvasāmyena sarvavaināśikān smārayatīti tadanantaraṃ vaināśikamatanirākaraṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1869: tadidaṃ dūṣaṇāya vaināśikamatamupanyasituṃ tatprakārabhedānāha--sa ca bahuprakāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1873: atha tvatrabhavatāṃ sarvajñānāṃ tattvapratipattibhedo na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1878: ye tu prakṛṣṭamatayastebhyaḥ sākṣādeva śūnyatātattvaṃ pratipādyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1893: rūpyante ebhiriti rūpyanta iti ca vyutpatyā saviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi rūpaskandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1894: yadyapi rūpyamāṇāḥ pṛthivyādayo bāhyāstathāpi kāyasthatvādvā indriyasaṃbandhādvā bhavantyādhyātmikāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1896: vedanāskandho yā priyāpriyānubhayaviṣayasparśe suḥkhaduḥkhatadrahitaviśeṣāvasthā cittasya jāyate sa vedanāskandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1898: yathā ḍitthaḥ kuṇḍalī gauro brāhmaṇo gacchatītyevañjātīyakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1905: rūpavijñānādiskandhahetuke ca samudāya ādhyātmike 'bhipreyamāṇe tadaprāptistasya samudāyasyāyuktatā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1908: cetano hi kulālādiḥ sarvaṃ mṛddaṇḍādyupasaṃhṛtya samudāyātmakaṃ ghaṭamāracayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1909: nahyasati mṛddaṇḍādivyāpāriṇī viduṣi kulāle svayamacetanā mṛddaṇḍādayo vyāpṛtya jātu ghaṭamāracayanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1910: na cāsati kuvinde tantuvemādayaḥ paṭaṃ vayante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1914: cetanānadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo vyāvartamānā cetanādhiṣṭhitatva evāvatiṣṭhata iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1918: taddhīndriyādiviṣayasparśe satyabhijvalat tatkāraṇacakraṃ yathāyathā kāryāya paryāptaṃ tathātathā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1930: yadyucyeta asamavahitānyeva kāraṇāni kāryaṃ kariṣyanti parasparānapekṣāṇi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1935: yat khalvekaṃ yadi sthiramāsthīyeta tato nāmāntareṇātmaiva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1945: tena vyāpāravatā vyāpārātpūrvaṃ vyāpārasamaye ca bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1956: atha punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataśca pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1958: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ--yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuro 'ṅkurātpatraṃ patrātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnālo nālādgarbho garbhācchūkaḥ śūkātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1963: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1964: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahaṃ bījena nirvartita iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1965: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ phalaṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1967: tasmādasatyapi caitanye bījādīnāmasatyapi cānyasminnadhiṣṭhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamo dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1975: tatra ca pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karoti yato 'ṅkuraḥ kaṭhino bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1981: tadeteṣāmavikalānāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāye bīje rohityaṅkuro jāyate nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1982: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1986: tathādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1987: tatrāsya hetūpanibandho yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇādīti avidyā cennābhaviṣyannaiva saṃskārā ajaniṣyanta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1991: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayā nirvartitā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1992: evaṃ yāvajjātyā api naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jarāmaraṇādyabhinirvartayāmīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1993: jarāmaraṇādīnāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirnirvartitā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1994: atha ca satsvavidyādiṣu svayamacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapi saṃskārādīnāmutpattiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2004: yastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati pañcavijñānakāryasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2006: yadā hyādhyātmikāḥ pṛthivyādidhātavo bhavantyavikalāstadā sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyasyotpattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2007: tatra pṛthivyādidhātūnāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ kāyasya kāṭhinyādi nirvartayāma iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2044: janmādihetukā avidyādayo 'vidyādihetukāśca janmādayo ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamānāḥ santīti tadetairavidyādibhirākṣiptaḥ saṃghāta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2047: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ--yat khalu hetūpanibandhaṃ kāryaṃ tadanyānapekṣaṃ hetumātrādhīnotpādatvādutpadyatāṃ nāma /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2057: na caikasmādeva kāraṇātkāryasiddheḥ kimanyaiḥ kāraṇairiti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2059: na caiko 'pitatkāraṇasamarthaṃ ityanya udāsata iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2060: nahi te prekṣāvanto yenaivamālocayeyurasmāsu samartha eko 'pi kārye iti kṛtaṃ naḥ saṃnidhineti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2062: tāṃśca sarvānanapekṣān pratītya kāryamapi na notpattumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2063: naca svamahimnā sarve kāryamutpādayanto 'pi nānākāryāṇāmīsate tatraiva teṣāṃ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2069: hantānena krameṇa tataḥ pūrve tataḥ pūrve sarva evānapekṣāstattatsvakāryopajanana
GSP33brsvbh2u:2071: bījakṣaṇo janayitavyaḥ so 'napekṣa eva bījakṣaṇaḥ svakāryopajanane evaṃ sarva eva
GSP33brsvbh2u:2072: tadanantarānantapavartino bījakṣaṇa anapekṣā iti kusūlanihitabīja eva syāt kṛtī kṛṣīvalaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2074: yena hi bījakṣaṇena svakṣaṇaparamparayāṅkuro janayitavyastasyānapekṣāsau kṣaṇaparamparā kusūla evāṅkuraṃ kariṣyatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2075: tasmātparasparāpekṣā evāntyā vā madhyā vā pūrve vā kṣaṇāḥ kāryopajanana iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2087: tatra na tāvat kāraṇamanyathānupapadyamānaṃ kāryamutpādayati, kintu
GSP33brsvbh2u:2091: tacca sthirapakṣe 'pi satyapi ca bhoktaryadhiṣṭhātāraṃ cetanamantareṇa na saṃbhavati kimaṅga,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2094: sa tu bhoktāpi nāstīti dūrotsāritatvaṃ darśayati--bhoktṛrahiteṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2095: api ca bahava upakāryopakārakabhāvena sthitāḥ kāryaṃ janayanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2102: yadā hi pratyayopanibandhaḥ pratītyasamutpādo bhavettadā cetano 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣetāpi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2105: hetuḥ svabhāvata eva kāryasaṃghātaṃ kariṣyati kevala iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2106: astu tāvadyathā kevalāddhetoḥ kāryaṃ nopajāyata iti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2108: saṃprati pratyayopanibandhanaṃ pratītyasamutpādamāstāya codayati--atha manyase saṃghātā eveti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2109: asthirā api hi bhāvāḥ sadā saṃhatā evodayante vyante ca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2115: khalu saṃghātasaṃtativarti dharmādharmāhvayaḥ saṃskārasaṃtāno yathāyathaṃ sukhaduḥkhe janayannāgantukaṃ kañcanānāsādya svata eva janayet, āsādya vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2120: tasmādanenāgantukānapekṣasya saṃdhātasaṃtānasyaiva sadṛśajanane visadṛśajanane vā svabhāva āstheyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2123: aprāptabhogo hi bhogārthī bhogamāptukāmastatsādhane pravartata iti pratyātmasiddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2124: seyaṃ pravṛttirbhogādanyasmin sthire bhoktari bhogatatsādhanasamayavyāpini kalpyate nāsthire /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2126: nahi bhogo bhogāya kalpate nāpyanyo bhogāyānyasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2140: na tāvadvaiśeṣikavannirodhakāraṇasāṃnidhyaṃ nirudhyamānatā svīkriyate vaināśikairakāraṇaṃ vināśamabhyupagacchadbhistasyāniṣṭhatvād /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2145: kāraṇasya hi kāryotpādāt prākkālasattār'thavatī na kāryakālā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2146: tadā kāryasya siddhatvena tatsidydharthāyāḥ sattāyā anupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2148: bhūtvā vyāpṛtya bhāvāḥ prāyeṇa hi kāryaṃ kurvanto loke dṛśyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2152: yathāhuḥ--'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate 'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2153: bhavatyevaṃ vyāpāravattā tathāpi kṣaṇikasya na kāraṇatvamityāha--tathāpi naivopapadyatekṣaṇikasya kāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2155: yadi ca na kāryasamaye kāraṇaṃ sat kathaṃ teṣāṃ tadātmanānubhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2156: naca kāraṇasādṛśyaṃ kāryasya na tu tādātmyamiti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2160: sarvathā vailakṣaṇye tu hetuphalabhāvastantughaṭādāvapi prāpta ityatiprasaṅga ityāha--vinaiva veti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2165: api cotpādanirodhayorvikalpatraye 'pi vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga ityāha--api cotpādanirodhau nāmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2177: evaṃ sukhādīnāmapi caittānāṃ cittābhinnahetujānāṃ catvāryetānyeva kāraṇāni /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2192: hetuphalabhāvena hi vyavasthitāḥ saṃtānina evodayavyayadharmāṇaḥ saṃtānāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2195: sa kiṃ phalaṃ kiñcidārabhate na vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2201: tadasatve tajjanakamapyasajjanakatvenāsadityanena krameṇāsantaḥ sarva eva saṃtānina iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2207: kathañcitsārūpye vā visabhāge 'pyantataḥ sattayā tadastīti na saṃtānocchedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2210: atra tāvadutpannamātrāpravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2212: tathāpi doṣāntaramubhayasminnapi nirodho brūte--na hi bhāvānāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2213: yato niranvayo vināśo na saṃbhavatyato nirūpākhyo 'pi na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2220: tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvānna vināśa ityavasthāvato 'vināśānnāvasthānāṃ niranvayo vināśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2225: yenāsya na niranvayo nāśaḥ syādityata āha--aspaṣṭapratyabhijñānāsvapīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2226: atrāpi tattoyaṃ tejasā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamambudatvāya nīyata ityanumeyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2228: śakyaṃ tatra vaktum 'udabindau ca sindhau ca toyabhāvona bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2240: tathāhi--jātimattvena sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya śabdasyāsparśatve sati bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatvena gandhādivadguṇatvamanumitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2246: tasmādguṇo bhūtvā gandhādivadasādhāraṇendriyagrāhyo yadravyamanumāpayati tadākāśaṃ pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ vastviti / api
GSP33brsvbh2u:2255: smṛtirupapatsyata iti manyamāno na parituṣyati taṃ prati pratyabhijñāsamājñātapratyakṣavirodhamāha--api
GSP33brsvbh2u:2267: na tu tattvataḥ pūrvāparau kṣaṇau tayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vā gṛhṇāti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2271: nānāpadārthasaṃbhinnavākyārthābhāsastāvadayaṃ vikalpaḥ prathate tatraite nānāpadārthā na prathanta iti bruvāṇaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ bādheta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2275: tathāsati pratyākāraṃ jñānānāṃ samāptesteṣāṃ ca parasparavārtājñānābhāvānnānetyeva na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2278: yadyucyeta astyetasmin vikalpe tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti padadvayaprayogo na tviha
GSP33brsvbh2u:2284: na caitatsarvamasati vikalpānāṃ bāhyālambanatve 'sati ca lokaprasiddhapadārthakatve bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2288: na cālaukikārthenānityaśabdenātmani vibhutvaṃ vivakṣitvānityaśabdaṃ prayuñjāno laukikārthaṃ nityaśabdamātmani prayuñjānena vipratipadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2289: tasmādanena svapakṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhāpayiṣatā parapakṣasādhanaṃ ca nirācikīrṣatā vikalpānāṃ lokasiddhapadārthakatā bāhyalambanatā ca vaktavyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2290: yadyucyeta dvividho hi vikalpānāṃ viṣayo grāhyaścādhyavaseyaśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2292: tathāca pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahalakṣaṇā vipratipattiḥ prasiddhapadārthakatvaṃ copapadyata ityata āha--evamevaiṣor'tha iti niścitaṃ yattadeva
GSP33brsvbh2u:2302: nahi jātu sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2304: api ca tathāsati yukta iti pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2307: yadi gṛhyamāṇe tadā kiṃ vikalpenāho tatsamayajenāvikalpakena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2313: na ca tatsamayabhāvinā nirvikalpakena gṛhyamāṇe bāhye vikalpenāgṛhīte tatra vikalpaḥ svākāramāropayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2314: na hi rajatajñānāpratibhāsini purovartini vastuni rajatajñānena śakyaṃ rajatamāropayitum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2315: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye svākāra ityeva syānna bāhya iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2317: api cāyaṃ vikalpaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ santaṃ vikalpaṃ kiṃ vastusantaṃ svākāraṃ gṛhītvā paścādbāhyamāropayati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2319: na tāvat kṣaṇikatayā kramavirahiṇo jñānasya kramavartinī grahaṇāropaṇe kalpete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2323: bāhyaṃ cāropyamāṇamaviśadaṃ sattato 'nyadeva syānna tu svākāraḥ samāropitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2327: hanta tarhi trailokyata evānena na bhedo gṛhīta iti yatra kvacana pravartetāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2330: api ca sādṛśyanibandhanaḥ saṃvyavahārastenedaṃ sadṛśamityevamākārabuddhinibandhano bhavenna tu tadevedamityākārabuddhinibandhana ityāha--nacāyaṃ sādṛśyātsaṃvyavahāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2331: nanu jvālādiṣu sādṛśyādasatyāmapi sādṛśyabuddhau tadbhāvāvagamanibandhanaḥ saṃvyahāro dṛśyate yathā tathehāpi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2333: tathāhi--vividhajanasaṃkīrṇagopureṇa puraṃ niviśamānaṃ narāntarebhya ātmanirdhāraṇāyāsādhāraṇaṃ cihnaṃ vidadhatamupahasanti pāśupataṃ pṛthagjanā iti //25//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2349: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ--kūṭastho hi kāryajananasvabhāvo vā syādatatsvabhāvo vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2350: sa cetkāryajananasvabhāvastato yāvadanena kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ tāvatsahasaiva kuryāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2353: yadyucyeta samartho 'pi kramavatsahakārisacivaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karotīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2360: bhede tūpakārasya tasmin sati kāryasya bhāvādasati cābhāvātsatyapi kūṭasthe kāryānutpādādanvayavyatirekābhyāmupakāra
GSP33brsvbh2u:2361: eva kāryakārī na bhāva iti nārthakriyākārī bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2376: viśeṣaṇayoge vā so 'pi bhāvaḥ syānna nirūpākhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2378: api ca yadyenānanvitaṃ na tattasya vikāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2385: sthiro 'pi bhāvaḥ kramavatsahakārisamavadhānāt krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2387: sa cāsya sahakāribhirādhīyamānā upakāro na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2394: apica ye 'pi sarvato vilakṣaṇāni svalakṣaṇāni vastusantyāsthiṣata,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2397: nahi bījādbījāntarasya vā kramelakasya vātyantavailakṣaṇye kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2404: prapañcastu brahmatatvasamīkṣānyāyakaṇikayoḥ kṛta iti neha pratanyate vistarabhayāt //26//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2412: atha pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitiriti hi catasṛṣu vidhāsu tatvaparisamāptirāsāmanyatamābhāve 'pi tattvasyāvyavasthānāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2413: tasmādanena vijñānaskandhamātraṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā catasro vidhā eṣitavyāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2415: nahyasti saṃbhavo vijñānamātraṃ catasro vidhāścetyata āha--tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2417: tathāpi buddhyārūḍhena buddhiparikalpitenāntastha evaiṣa pramāṇaprameyaphalavyavahāraḥ pramātṛvyavahāraścetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2424: bāhyavādinorapi vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayoḥ kālpanika eva pramāṇaphalavyavahāro 'bhimata ityāha--satyapi bāhyer'tha iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2426: nahi khadiragocare paraśau palāśe dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2430: na ca jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇamanaṃśamaṃśābhyāṃ vastusadbhyāṃ yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2442: sa hi vijñānālambanatvābhimato bāhyor'thaḥ paramāṇustāvanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2448: kimayaṃ pratibhāsasya jñānasya dharma uta pratibhāsanakāler'thasya dharmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2462: pratibhāsadaśāpannānāṃ tu teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati bahutvādivatsāṃvṛtaṃ sthaulyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2466: sāṃvṛtaṃ grahaṇaṃ nānyanna ca vastugraho bhramaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2470: gandharasasparśaparamāṇvantaritā hi te rūpaparamāṇavo na nirantarāḥ tasmādārātsāntareṣu
GSP33brsvbh2u:2471: vṛkṣeṣvekadhanavanapratyayavadeṣa sthūlapratyayaḥ paramāṇuṣu sāntareṣu bhrānta eveti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2472: tasmāt kalpanāṣoḍhatve 'pi bhrāntatvādghaṭādipratyayasya pītaśaṅkhādijñānavanna pratyakṣatā paramāṇugocaratvābhyupagame /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2483: apratibhāsamānasadbhāve ca pramāṇābhāvānna bāhyālambanāḥ pratyayā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2485: nahi yathendriyamarthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayatyevaṃ vijñānamaparaṃ vijñānaṃ janayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2489: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'pratyutpanno dharmī dharmāścāsya pratyutpannā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2491: taccānākāraṃ sadājānato bhedābhāvāt kathamarthabhedaṃ vyavasthāpayediti tadbhedavyavasthāpanāyākārabhedo 'syaiṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2496: sa cedvijñānasya nārthasadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇamastītyāha--apicānubhavamātreṇa sādhāraṇātmano jñānasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2498: yadyena saha niyatasahopalambhanaṃ tattato na bhidyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2501: niṣedhyo hi bhedaḥ sahopalambhāniyamena vyāpto yathā bhinnāvaśvinau nāvaśyaṃ sahopalabhyete kadācidabhrāpidhāne 'nyatarasyaikasyopalabdheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2502: so 'yamiha bhedavyāpakāniyamavirūddho niyama upalabhyamānastadvyāpyaṃ bhedaṃ nivartayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2507: yo yaḥ pratyayaḥ sa sarvo bāhyānāvambanaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2510: bāhyānālambanatā hi pratyayatvamātrānubandhinī vṛkṣateva śiṃśapātvamātrānubandhinīti tanmātrānubandhini nirālambanatve sādhye bhavati pratyayatvaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2511: atrāntare sautrāntikaścodayati--kathaṃ punarasati bāhyer'the nīlamidaṃ pītamityādipratyayavaicitryamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2512: sa hi mene ye yasmin satyapi kādācitkāste sarve tadatiriktahetusāpekṣāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2514: tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ satyapyālayavijñānasaṃtāne ṣaḍapi pravṛttipratyayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2518: tasyāśca svakāryopajanaṃ pratyābhimukhyaṃ paripākastasya ca pratyayaḥ svasaṃtānavartī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ saṃtānāntarāpekṣānabhyupagamāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2523: nanvevamekasyaiva nīlajñānopajanasāmarthyaṃ tatprabodhasāmarthyaṃ ceti kṣaṇāntarasyaitanna syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2524: sattve vā kathaṃ kṣaṇabhedātsāmarthyabheda ityālayasaṃtānavartinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samarthahetusadbhāve kāryakṣepānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2525: svasaṃtānamātrādhīnatve niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddhaṃ sadātanatvaṃ tasyopalabdhyā kādācitkatvaṃ nivartamānaṃ hetvantarāpekṣatve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2527: sarveṣāmiṣyate pravṛttivijñānānāṃ vijñānavādibhirapi tu kasyacideva vicchinnagamanavacanapratibhāsasya pravṛttivijñānasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2529: sattvāntarasaṃtānanimittatve tasyāpi sadā saṃnidhānānna kādācitkatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2530: na hi sattvāntarasaṃtānasya deśataḥ kālato vā viprakarṣasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2532: tasmādasati bāhyer'the pratyayavaicitryānupapatterastyānumāniko bāhyārtha iti sautrāntikāḥ pratipedire,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2535: tathāhi--bāhyanimittakatve 'pi kathaṃ kadācit nīlasaṃvedanaṃ kadācit pītasaṃvedanam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2537: atha pītasaṃnidhāne 'pi kimiti nīlajñānaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2542: evaṃ tarhi kṣaṇānāmapi svakāraṇabhedanibandhaḥ śaktibhedo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2543: saṃtānino hi kṣaṇāḥ kāryabhedahetavaste ca pratikāryaṃ bhidyante ca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2544: na ca saṃtāno nāma kaścideka utpādakaḥ kṣaṇānāṃ yadabhedāt kṣaṇā na bhidyeran /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2547: anyathaika eva kṣaṇe nīlajñānajananasāmarthyaṃ iti na bhūyo nīlajñānāni jāyeran /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2554: hanta tarhi nīlasaṃtānānāmapi mitho bhinnānāṃ naikamasti nīlākārādhānasāmarthyamiti saṃnidhāne 'pi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2556: tasmātsaṃtānāntarāṇāmiva kṣaṇāntarāṇāmapi svakāraṇabhedādhīnopajanānāṃ keṣāñcideva sāmarthyabhedaḥ keṣāñcinneti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2557: tathā caikālayajñānasaṃtānapatiteṣu kasyacideva jñānakṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ sāmarthyātiśayo vāsanāparanāmā svapratyayāsāditaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2558: yato nīlākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ jāyate na pītākāram /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2559: kasyacittu sa tādṛśo yataḥ pītākāraṃ jñānaṃ na nīlākāramiti vāsanāvaicitryādeva svapratyayāsāditājjñānavaicitryasiddherna tadatiriktārthasadbhāve kiñcanāsti pramāṇamiti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2572: nahi sphuṭatare sarvajanīna upalambhe sati tadabhāvaḥ śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2575: upalabdhigrāhiṇā hi sākṣiṇopalabdhirgṛhyamāṇā bāhyaviṣayatvenaiva gṛhyate nopalabdhimātramityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2580: idamatrākūtam--ghaṭapaṭādayo hi sthūlā bhāsante na tu paramasūkṣmāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2592: na ca tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī samastajñānākārasaṃkalanātmaka ekaḥ sthūlavikalpo vijṛmbhata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2594: yathāha dharmakīrtiḥ-'tasmānnārthe na ca jñāne sthūlābhāsastadātmanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2601: asatyarthe tatsārūpyasya tadvyavasthāyāścānupapatterityāha-na ca jñānasya viṣayasārūpyāditi //
GSP33brsvbh2u:2602: yaśca sahopalambhaniyama uktaḥ so 'pi vikalpaṃ na sahate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2603: yadi jñānārthayoḥ sāhityenopalambhastato viruddho heturnābhedaṃ sādhayitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2607: api ca kimekatvenopalambha āho eka upalambho jñānārthayoḥ / na
GSP33brsvbh2u:2610: tatrāha--ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayo 'rupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityavagantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2611: yathā hi sarvaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prabhārūpānuviddhaṃ buddhibodhyaṃ niyamena manujairupalabhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2615: api ca yatraikavijñānagocarau ghaṭapaṭau tatrārthabhedaṃ vijñānabhedaṃ cādyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2618: api ca svarūpamātraparyavasitaṃ jñānaṃ jñānāntaravārtānabhijñamiti yayorbhedaste dve na gṛhīte iti bhedo 'pi tadgato na gṛhīta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2620: evaṃ svamasādhāraṇamanyato vyāvṛttaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tadapi yadvyāvartate yataśca vyāvartate tadanekajñānasādhyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2631: evaṃ mokṣapratijñā ca yo mucyate yataśca mucyate yena mucyate tadanekajñānasādhyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2632: evaṃ vipratipannaṃ pratipādayituṃ pratijñeti yatpratipādayati yena pratipādayati yaśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:2634: tatsarvaṃ vijñānasya svāṃśālambane 'nupapannamityāha--api ca dvayorvijñānayoḥ pūrvottarakālayoriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2635: api ca bhedāśrayaḥ karmaphalabhāvo nābhinne jñāne bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2636: no khalu chidā chidyate kintu dāru /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2638: tadihāpi na jñānaṃ svāṃśena jñeyamātmani vṛttivirodhādapi tu tadatiriktor'thaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2643: ayamarthaḥ--svarūpādatiriktamarthaṃ cedvijñānaṃ gṛhṇāti tatastadapratyakṣaṃ sannarthaṃ pratyakṣayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2648: taccet jñānāntareṇa pratīyeta tadapratītaṃ nārthaviṣayaṃ jñānamaparokṣayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2649: evaṃ tattadityanavasthā tasmādanavasthāyā bibhyatā varaṃ svātmani vṛttirāsthitā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2656: apitu tasminnindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādantaḥ karaṇavikārabheda utpannamātra eva prabhāturarthaścopalambhaśca pratyakṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2668: yathā vā paktā pākyaṃ pākena vyāpnoti nanu pākaṃ pākāntareṇa,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2669: nāpi pāka eva paktā kintu svata eva devadettādiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2670: evaṃ pramātā prameyaṃ nīlādi pramayā vyāpnoti na tu pramāṃ pramāntareṇa,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2672: kintu svata eva pramāyāḥ pramātā vyāpakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2673: na ca pramātari kūṭasthanityacaitanye pramāpekṣāsaṃbhavo yataḥ pramātuḥ pramāyāḥ pramātrantarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2674: tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ 'vijñānagrahaṇamātra eva vijñānasākṣiṇaḥ pramātuḥ kūṭasthanityacaitanyasya grahaṇākāṅkṣānutpādāt'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2680: grāhyatvaṃ ca jñānasya na grāhakakriyājanitaphalaśālitayā yathā bāhyārthasya,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2684: grāhyo 'pyarthaḥ pramātāraṃ prati satyāṃ saṃvidi prakaṭaḥ saṃvidapi prakaṭā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2686: syādetat yatprakāśate tadanyena prakāśyate yathā jñānārthau tathā ca sākṣiti nāsti pratyayasākṣiṇorvaiṣamyamityata āha--svayaṃsiddhasya ca sākṣiṇo 'pratyākhyeyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2694: svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2699: na phalasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ vāstīti pradīpavatkartrantarameṣitavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2702: nanu sākṣisthāne 'stvasmadabhimatameva vijñānaṃ tathā ca nāmnyeva vipratipattirnārthā
GSP33brsvbh2u:2706: bhavanti hi vijñānasyotpādādayo dharmā abhyupetāstathā cāsya phalatayā nāvagantṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2715: jāgratpratyayasya tu bādhyatve svapnapratyayasyāsau na bādhako bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2717: tathā ca na svapnapratyayo mithyeti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt svapnavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2718: tasmādbādhābādhābhyāṃ vaidharmyānna svapnapratyayadṛṣṭāntena jāgratpratyayasya śakyaṃ nirālambanatvamadhyavasātum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2727: sāpi ca nidrādoṣādviparītāvartamānamapi pitrādi vartamānatayā bhāsayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2730: api ca svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe jāgratpratyayānāṃ yathārthatvamanubhavasiddhaṃ nānumānenānyathayituṃ śakyam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2741: prāgutpannasya cādheyotpādasamaye 'sataḥ kṣaṇikatvavyāghāta ityāśayavānāha--api ca vāsanā nāmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2746: yadi sākāraṃ vijñānaṃ saṃbhavati bāhyaścārthaḥ sthūlasūkṣmavikalpenāsaṃbhavī hantaivamarthajñāne sattvena tāvadvicāraṃ na sahete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2758: tadetannirācikīrṣurāha--śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2760: taiḥ khalu satsaditi gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtamaviparītaṃ tattvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2763: sadasatośca vicārāsahatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddhaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2765: yadyucyeta tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pramāṇānāmanena vicāreṇa vyudasyate na sāṃvyavahārikam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2766: tathāca bhinnaviṣayatvānna sarvapramāṇavipratiṣedha ityata āha--nahyeyaṃ sarvapramāṇaprasiddho lalokavyavahāro 'nyatattvamanadhigamya śakyate 'pahnotum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2767: pramāṇāni hi svagocare pravartamānāni tattvamidamityeva pravartante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2769: na punaḥ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ naḥ prāmāṇyaṃ na tu tāttvikamityeva pravartante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2771: yathā śuktikeyaṃ na rajataṃ marīcayo na toyamekaścandro na candradvayamityādi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2772: tadvadihāpi samastapramāṇagocaraviparītatattvāntaravyavasthāpanenātāttvikatvameṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakena darśanīyaṃ na tvavyavasthāpitatattvāntareṇa pramāṇāni śakyāni bādhitum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2773: vicārāsahatvaṃ vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayadbādhakamatāttvikatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ darśayatīti cet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2775: kiṃ tadvastu paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamat kevalaṃ vicāraṃ na sahate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2777: tatra paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamadvicāraṃ na sahata iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2780: atha nistattvaṃ cet kathamanyatamattattvamavyavasthāpya śakyamevaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2783: so 'pi ca vicāraṃ na sahata ityuktaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2786: āropaśca tattvādhiṣṭhāno dṛṣṭo yathā śuktikādiṣu rajatādeḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2787: na cet kiñcidasti tattvaṃ kasya kasminnāropaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2789: tacca tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyātāttvikatvena sāṃvyavahārikatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakenopapadyata iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ //31//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2795: evaṃ kṣaṇikatvamabhyupetya 'utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā'iti nityatāmupaitītyādi bahūnnetavyamiti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2808: pudgalāstikāyāḥ ṣoḍhā-pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni sthāraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ceti dharmāstikāyaḥ pravṛttyanumeyo 'dharmāstikāyāḥ sthityanumeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2819: indriyadvārā hi pauruṣaṃ jyotirviṣayān spṛśadrūpādijñānarūpeṇa pariṇamata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2825: sā hyāsravasrotaso dvāraṃ saṃvṛṇotāti saṃvara ucyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2827: sa hi niḥśeṣaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogena jarayatīti nirjaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2835: ārhatadarśanābhyāsānna mokṣa iti jñānaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ karma /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2836: bahuṣu vipratiṣiddheṣu tīrthakarairupadarśiteṣu mokṣamārgeṣu viśeṣānavadhāraṇaṃ mohanīyaṃ karma /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2850: anye tūrdhvagamanaśīlo hi jīvo dharmādharmāstikāyena baddhastadvimokṣādyadūrdhvaṃ gacchatyeva sa mokṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2864: yadi punarayamanekāntadyotakaḥ syācchabdo na bhavet syādastītivākye syātpadamanarthakaṃ syāt tadidamuktam--'arthayogitvāt'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2865: anaikāntadyotakatve tu syādasti kathañcidastīti syātpadātkathañcidartho 'stītyanenānuktaḥ pratīyata iti nānarthakyam /
