GSP33brsvbh2u:2868: 'kiṃvṛtte pratyaye khalvayaṃ cinnipātavidhinā sarvathaikāntatyāgāt saptasvekānteṣu yo bhaṅgastatra yo nayastadapekṣaḥ san heyopādeyabhedāya syādvādaḥ kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2869: tathāhi--yadi vastvastyevetyevaikāntatastat sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanāstyeveti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2870: na tadīpsājihāsābhyāṃ kvacit kadācit kathañcit kaścit pravarteta nivarteta vā prāptāprāpaṇīyatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2872: anaikāntapakṣe tu kvacit kadācit kasyacit kathañcit sattve hānopādāne prekṣāvatāṃ kalpete iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2874: vibhajate--na hyekasmindharmaṇi paramārthasati paramārthasatāṃyugapatsattvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parasparaparihārasvarūpāṇāṃsamāveśaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2876: vastutastatsarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanā nirvacanīyena rūpeṇāstyeva na nāsti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2884: laukikānāmabādhena tu tadvyavasthāyāṃ dehātmābhimānasyāpyabādhena tāttvikatve sati lokāyatamatāpātena nāstikatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2885: paṇḍitarūpāṇāṃ tu dehātmābhimānasya vicārato bādhanaṃ prapañcasyāpyanaikāntasya tulyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2886: api ca sadasattvayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvena samuccayābhāve vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2888: tasmāt sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānavat saptatvapañcatvanirdhāraṇasya phalasya nirdhārayituśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:2889: pramātustatkaraṇasya pramāṇasya ca tatprameyasya ca saptatvapañcatvasya sadasattvasaṃśaye
GSP33brsvbh2u:2891: nirdhāraṇasya caikāntasattve sarvatra nānekāntavāda ityāha--ya ete sapta padārthā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2898: ye hi paricchinnāste sarve 'nityā yathā ghaṭādayastathā cātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2901: manuṣyakāyaparimāṇo hi jīvo na hastikāyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyāptumarhatyalpatvādityātmanaḥ kṛtsnaśarīrāvyāpitvādakārtsnyam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2903: tathā hastiśīraraṃ parityajya yadā puttikāśarīro bhavati tadā na tatra kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyetetyakārtsnyamātmanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2907: yathā hi pradīpo ghaṭamahāharmyodaravartī saṃkocavikāśavānevaṃ jīvo 'pi puttikāhastidehayorityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2920: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ / BBs_2,2.35 /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2926: kiṃ caite jīvāvayavāḥ pratyekaṃ vā cetayeran samūho vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2927: teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ caitanye bahūnāṃ cetanānāmekābhiprāyatvaniyamābhāvāt kadācidviruddhadikkriyatvena śarīramunmathyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2928: samūhacaitanye tu hastiśarīrasya puttikāśarīratve dvitrāvayavaśeṣo jīvo na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2931: pūrvasūtraprasañjitāyāṃ jīvānityatāyāṃ bauddhavatsaṃtānanityatāmāśaṅkyedaṃ sūtram--'na ca paryāyādapyavirodho vikārādibhyaḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2932: na ca paryāyāt parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi saṃtānābhyupagamenātmano nityatvādavirodho bandhamokṣayoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2940: evaṃ hi mokṣāvasthābhāvi jīvaparimāṇaṃ nityaṃ bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2958: sa ca nānākleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ pradhānapuruṣābhyāmanyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2969: paśava ātmānasteṣāṃ pāśo bandhanaṃ tadvimokṣo duḥkhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2970: eṣa teṣāmabhisaṃdhiḥ--cetanasya khalvadhiṣṭhātuḥ kumbhakārādeḥ kumbhādikārye nimittakāraṇatvamātraṃ na tūpādānatvamapi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2985: tena śrutasiddyarthamadṛṣṭāni dṛṣṭaviparītasvabhāvāni subahūnyapi kalpyamānāni na lohagandhitāmāvahanti pramāṇavattvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2986: yastu tatra kathañciddṛṣṭānusāraḥ kriyate sa suhṛdbhāvamātreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2987: āgamānapekṣitamanumānaṃ tu dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇa pravartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaviparyaye tuṣādapi bibhetitarāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2991: ayamarthaḥ--yadīśvaraḥ karuṇāparādhīno vītarāgastataḥ praṇinaḥ kapūye karmaṇi na pravartayet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2994: na hīśvarādhīnā janāḥ svātantryeṇa kapūyaṃ karma kartumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2995: tadanadhiṣṭhitaṃ vā kapūyaṃ karma phalaṃ prasotumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2996: tasmātsvatantro 'pīśvaraḥ karmabhiḥ pravartyata iti dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3000: pūrvakarmaṇeśvaraḥ saṃpratitane karmaṇi pravartyate teneśvareṇa saṃpratitanaṃ karma svakārye pravartyeta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3005: tathehāpi dvāvapi pravartyāviti kaḥ kaṃ pravartayedityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3008: asmākaṃ tu nāyaṃ samaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3010: na ca kāruṇyaṃ doṣa ityata āha--svārthaprayukta eva ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3011: kāruṇye hi satyasya duḥkhaṃ bhavati tena tatprahāṇāya pravartata iti kāruṇikā api svārthaprayuktā eva pravartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3012: nanu svārthaprayukta eva pravartatāmevamapi ko doṣa ityata āha--svārthavatvādīśvarasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3019: aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogo na sarvagatānāṃ saṃbhavatyaprāpterabhāvānniravayavatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3022: tasmādavyāpyavṛttitāyāḥ saṃyogasya vyāpikāyā nivṛttestadvyāpyasya saṃyogasya vinivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3033: āgamo hi pravṛtti prati na dṛṣṭāntamapekṣata ityadṛṣṭapūrve tadviruddhe ca pravartituṃ samarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3037: asmākaṃ tvīśvarāgamayoranāditvādīśvarayonitve 'pyāgamasya na virodha iti bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3046: rūpādihīnakaraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ hi puruṣasya svabhogādāveva dṛṣṭaṃ nānyatra /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3048: tasmādrūpādihīnaṃ karaṇaṃ vyāpārayata īśvarasya bhogādiprasaktiḥ tathā cānīśvaratvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3055: api ca sarvatrānumānaṃ pramāṇayataḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāmapi saṃkhyābhedavattvamantavattvaṃ ca dravyatvāt saṃkhyānyatve sati prameyatvādvānumātavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3057: asmākaṃ tvāgamagamyer'the tadbādhitaviṣayatayā nānumānaṃ prabhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3058: svarūpaparimāṇamapi yasya yādṛśamaṇu mahat paramamahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3059: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3061: yasya tvanta eva nāsti tasya tadagrahaṇaṃ nāsarvajñatāmāvahati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3075: yadyapyanekaśilpaparyavadātaḥ paraśuṃ kṛtvā tena palāśaṃ chinatti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3076: yadyapi ca prayatnenendriyārthātmamanaḥ saṃnikarṣalakṣaṇaṃ jñānakaraṇamupādāyātmārthaṃ vijānāti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3077: tathāpi saṃkarṣaṇo 'karaṇaḥ kathaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ manaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3091: na tāvadete parasparaṃ bhinnā īśvarāḥ parasparavyāhatecchā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3094: saṃbhūya ceśanāyāṃ pariśuddho na kaściddīśvaraḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3102: guṇibhyaḥ khalvātmabhyo jñānādīn guṇān bhedenoktvā punarabhedaṃ brūte--ātmāna evaite bhagavanto vāsudevā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3103: ādigrahaṇena pradyumnāniruddhayormano 'haṅkāralakṣaṇatayātmano bhedamabhidhāyātmana evaita iti tadviruddhābhedābhidhānamaparaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3105: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33brsvbh2u:3106: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥpādaḥ // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsvbh2u:3116: iha hi pūrvapakṣe śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhaḥ pratipādyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3119: tasyābhisaṃdhiḥ-yadyapi taittirīyake viyadutpattiśrutirasti tathāpi tasyāḥ pramāṇāntaravirodhādbahuśrutivirodhācca gauṇatvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3124: athāsti tataḥ śrutivirodha iti tatparihārāya prayatnāntaramāstheyamityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3128: taittirīye hi sargaprakaraṇe kevalasyākāśasyaiva prathamaḥ sargaḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3129: chāndogye ca kevalasya tejasaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3131: śrutasiddhyarthaṃ khalvaśrutaṃ kalpyate na tu tadvighātāya,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3138: na khalviha sarge kṣīrāddadhi jāyate sargāntare tu dadhnaḥ kṣīramiti bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3139: tasmātsargaśrutayaḥ parasparavirodhinyo nāsminnarthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3145: samavāyyasamavāyinimittakāraṇebhyo hi kāryasyotpattirniyatā tadabhāve na bhavitumarhati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3147: apica ya utpadyante teṣāṃ prāgutpatteranubhavārthakriye nopalabhyte utpannasya ca dṛśyete,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3177: api cāvyatiriktadeśakālamākāśaṃ brahmaṇā ca brahmakāryaiśca tadabhinnasvabhāvairataḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3183: brahmavivartātmatayājagatastadvikārasya vastuto brahmaṇābhede brahmaṇi jñāte jñānamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3185: tasmādākāśamapi tadvivartatayā tadvikāraḥ sattajjñānena jñātaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3186: avikāratve tu tatastattvāntaraṃ na brahmaṇi vidite viditaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3188: nahi kṣīrasya pūrṇakumbhe kṣīre gṛhyamāṇe satsvapi pāthobinduṣu pāthastattvaṃ prati jñātatvamasti vijñāne /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3189: tasmānna te kṣīre vidite viditā iti pratijñādṛṣṭāntapracayānuparodhāya viyata utpattirakāmenābhyupeyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3190: tadevaṃ siddhāntaikadeśini dūṣitepūrvapakṣī svapakṣe viśeṣamāha-satyaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3196: nanvasahāyaṃ tejaḥ prathamamavagamyamānaṃ sasahāyatvena virudhyata ityuktamata āha-nahīyaṃ śrutistejojanipradhāneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3206: hanta bhoḥ kathamekasya sraṣṭuranekavyāpāratvamaviruddhamityata āha-sraṣṭā tveko 'pīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3210: nacāsminnartha ekasya vākyasya vyāpāro 'pi tu bhinnānāṃ vākyānāmityāha-nacāsmābhiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3214: na caiṣa sṛṣṭiparo 'pi tu śamapara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3229: nahi māṇavake siṃhatvamupacarya na siṃhādanyo 'sti manāgapi māṇavaka iti vadanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3230: tasmādbrahmatvamaikāntikaṃ jagato vivakṣitaṃ śrutyā na tvaupacārikam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3231: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati natvalpatvamapi prāgevaupacārikamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3233: niḥśeṣavacanaḥ svarasataḥ sarvaśabdo nāsati śrutyantaravirodhe ekadeśavaviṣayo yujyata ityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3235: ākāśasyotpattau pramāṇāntaravirodhamuktamanubhāṣya tasya pramāṇāntarasya pramāṇāntaravirodhenāpramāṇabhūtasya na gauṇatvāpādanasāmarthyamata
GSP33brsvbh2u:3245: etaduktaṃ bhavati-sopādānaṃ cetkāryaṃ tata ātmaivopānatvena śruterupādānāntarakalpanānupapatteriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3255: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3259: pramāpramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ vartamānātītānāgatatve 'pi pramātuḥ sadā vartamānatvenānubhavādapracyutasvabhāvasya nāgantukaṃ sattvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3264: nanu jīvataḥ pramāturmā bhūdanyathābhāvo mṛtasya tu bhaviṣyatītyata āha-tathā bhasmībhavatyapīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3267: yasya tu na tadasyātmano na tasya tatkalpanaṃ yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3270: tadanena prabandhena pratyanumānenākāśānutpattyanumānaṃ tūṣayitvānaikāntikatvenāpi dūṣayati-yattūktaṃ samānajātīyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3272: yatra hi kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvena pariṇamate tatra nāvayavānāmanekeṣāmupādanatvamabhyupagantavyaṃ kintūpāttameva kṣīramekamupādeyadadhibhāvena pariṇamate
GSP33brsvbh2u:3277: yadyabhyāse bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvaṃ dūrata evopacaritatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3279: 'vāyuścāntarikṣametadamṛtam'iti dvayoramṛtatvamuktvā punaḥ pavanasya viśeṣeṇāha-saiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyuriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3289: bhūyasīḥ śrutīrapekṣya dve api śrutī śabdamātramukte //8//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3293: naca vacanamadṛṣṭvā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ iti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3297: na cātmanaḥ kāraṇavattve 'navasthā lohagandhitāmāvahatyanāditvāt kāryakāraṇaparamparāyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3302: sadekasvabhāvaṃ hi brahma śrūyate tadasati bādhake nānyathayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3303: uktametadvikārāḥ sattvenānubhūtā api katipayakālakalātikrame vinaśyanto dṛśyanta ityanirvacanīyāstraikālyāvacchedāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3304: na cātmā tādṛśastasya śruteranubhāvādvā vartamānaikasvabhāvatvaina prasiddhestadidamāha-sanmātraṃ hi brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3307: yathā rajjūpādānaḥ sarpo na tu sarpopādānā rajjuriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3312: pāramārthiko hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nādirnānavasthayā duṣyati. samāropastu vikārasya na samāropitopādāna ityupapāditaṃ mādhyamikamataniṣedhādhikāre,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3317: ye tu guṇadikkālotpattiviṣayamidamadhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrustaiḥ 'sato 'nupapatteḥ'iti kleśena vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3326: naca sākṣādbrahmajatvasaṃbhave tadvaṃśyatvena tajjatvaṃ paraṃparayāśrayituṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3328: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-yuktaṃ paśuyāgavājapeyoraṅgāṅginornānātvāttatra sākṣādvājapeyāsaṃbandhe kleśena paraṃparāśrayaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3329: iha tu vāyorbrahmavikārasyāpi brahmaṇo vastuto 'nanyatvādvayūpādānatve sākṣādeva
GSP33brsvbh2u:3333: yathā tasyāḥ śṛtamiti tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramparāmātrasāmyena na tu sarvathāṃ sāmyeneti sarvamavadātam //10//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3339: annaśabdo 'yaṃ vyutpattyā ca prasiddhyā ca vrīhiyavādau tadvikāre caudane pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3341: sā ca vākyaśeṣeṇopodbalitā 'yatra kvacana varṣati'ityetena tasmādabhyavahāryaṃ vrīhiyavādyevātrādbhyo jāyata iti vivakṣitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3345: tataśca śrutyantareṇa 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī pṛthivyā oṣadhayaḥ'ityādinā virodha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3347: tatra kim 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī'iti pṛthivīśabdo 'nnaparatayā nīyatāmuta 'annamasṛjata'ityannaśabdaḥ pṛthivīparatayeti viśaye,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3353: idānīmākāśādibhūtādhiṣṭhātryo devatāḥ kiṃ svatantrā evottarottarabhūtasarge pravartanta uta parameśvarādhiṣṭhitāḥ paratantrā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3354: tatra 'ākāśādvāyurvāyuragniḥ'iti svavākye nirapekṣāṇāṃ śruteḥ svayañcetanānāṃ ca cetanāntarāpekṣāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3355: prastāvasya ca liṅgasya ca pāramparyeṇāpi mūlākāraṇasya brahmaṇa upapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3356: svatantrāṇāmevākāśādīnāṃ vāyvādikāraṇatvamiti jagato brahmayonitvavyāghāta iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3359: naca cetanānāṃ svakāryasvātantryamityetadapyaikāntikaṃ paratantrāṇāmapi teṣāṃ bahulamupalabdherbhṛtyāntevāsyādivat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3360: tasmālliṅgaprastāvasāmañjasyāya sa īśvara eva tena tenākāśādibhāvenopādānabhāvenāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ svayamadhiṣṭhāya nimittakāraṇabhūtastaṃ taṃ vikāraṃ vāyvādikaṃ sṛjatīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3364: tasmātsarvasya kāryajātasya sākṣātparameśvara evādhiṣṭhātā nimittakāraṇaṃ na tvākāśādibhāvamāpannaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3367: viparyayeṇa tu kramo 'ta upapadyate ca / BBs_2,3.14 /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3368: utpattau mahābhūtānāṃ kramaḥ śruto nāpyaye 'pyayamātrasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3372: tatra kramabhedāpekṣāyāṃ kiṃ dṛṣṭo 'pyayakramo ghaṭādīnāṃ mahābhūtāpyayakramaniyāmako
GSP33brsvbh2u:3373: 'stvāho śrauta utpattikrama iti viśaye śrautasya śrautāntaramabhyarhitaṃ samānajātīyatayā
GSP33brsvbh2u:3376: tasmācchrautenaivotpattikrameṇāpyayakramo niyamyata iti prāpta ucyate-apyayasya kramāpekṣāyāṃ khalūtpattikramo niyāmako bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3388: tadevaṃ bhāvanopayoginau bhūtānāmutpattipralayau vicārya buddhīndriyamanasāṃ kramaṃ vicārayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3389: atra ca vijñāyate 'neneti vyutpattyā vijñānaśabdenendriyāṇi ca buddhiṃ ca brūte /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3390: tatraiteṣāṃ kramāpekṣāyāmātmānaṃ ca bhūtāni cāntarā samāmnānāttenaiva pāṭhena kramo niyamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3392: yata ātmanaḥ karaṇāni karaṇebhyaśca bhūtānīti pratīyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3394: annamayamiti ca mayaḍānandamaya itivat na vikārārtha iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-vibhaktatvāttāvanmanaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3395: kāraṇāpekṣāyāmannamayaṃ mana ityādiliṅgaśravaṇādapekṣitārthakathanāya vikārārthatvameva mayaṭo yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3399: evaṃ codbhūtavikārā mana ādayo bhūtānāṃ parastādutpadyanta iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3410: tanmṛto devadatto jāto devadatta iti vyapadeśasya mukhyatvaṃ manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3415: ata eva smaranti 'evamenaḥ śamaṃ yāti bījagarbhasamudbhavam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3421: ākāśāderiva tu mahāsargādau tadante cotpattivināśau jīvasya bhaviṣyata iti śaṅkāntaramapanetumidamārabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3431: 'yathāgneḥ śrudrā visphaliṅgaḥ'iti ca śrutiḥ sākṣādeva brahmavikāratvaṃ jīvānāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3432: 'yathā sūdīptāt pāvakāt'iti ca brahmaṇo jīvānāmutpattiṃ ca tatrāpyayaṃ ca sākṣāddarśayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3438: evaṃ hi kasyāñcicchākhāyāmāmnātasya katipāyāṅgasahitasya karmaṇaḥ śākhāntarīyāṅgopasaṃhāro na bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3440: tasmādākāśavajjīvātmāna utpadyanta iti prāpta ucyate-bhavedevaṃ yadi jīvā brahmaṇo bhidyeran /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3443: upādhīnā ca manomaya ityādīnāṃ śruterbhūyasīnāṃ ca nityatvājatvādigocarāṇāṃ śrutīnāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3445: ca 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ'iti śrutyaivoktatvānnityā jīvātmano na vikārā na
GSP33brsvbh2u:3450: karmaṇā hi jānātyartho vyāptastadabhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3458: na tu vyomna ivendriyādisaṃnikarṣe 'pyeṣā jñānaṃ na bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3459: tasmājjaḍā eva jīvā iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-yadāgantukajñānaṃ jaḍasvabhāvaṃ tatkadācit parokṣaṃ kadācit saṃdigdhaṃ kadācidviparyastaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3469: tasmādvṛttayaḥ kriyārūpāḥ sakarmikāḥ karmābhāve suṣuptyādau nivartante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3471: tathāca nityacaitanyavādinyaḥ śrutayo na kathañcit kleśena vyākhyātavyā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3480: sarvatra nityaprāptasya vā sarvātmakasya vā tadasaṃbhāvāditi //19//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3484: taccācalato 'pi tatra sato dehasvāmyanivṛttyopapadyate na tu gatyāgatī /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3485: tayoścalane nirūḍhayoḥ kartṛsthabhāvayorvyāpinyasaṃbhavāditi madhyamaṃ parimāṇaṃ mahattvaṃ śarīrasyaiva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3487: gatyāgatī ca paramamahati na saṃbhavato 'taḥ pāriśeṣyādaṇutvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3488: gatyāgatibhyāṃ ca prādeśikatvasiddhau maraṇamapi dehādapasarpaṇameva jīvasya na tu tatra sataḥ svāmyanivṛttimātramiti siddhamityāha-satyośca gatyāgatyoriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3495: yata utkrāntyādiśrutibhirjīvānāmaṇutvaṃ prasādhitaṃ tato vyāpakātparamātmanasteṣāṃ tadvikāratayā bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3496: tathāca mahattvānantyādiśrutayaḥ paramātmaviṣayā na jīvaviṣayā ityavirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3497: yadi jīvā aṇavastato 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu'iti kathaṃ śārīro mahattvasaṃbandhitvena pratinirdiśyate iti codayati-nanviti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3499: yathā hi garbhastha eva vāmadevo jīvaḥ paramārthadṛṣṭyātmano brahmatvaṃ pratipede,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3505: uddhṛtya mānamunmānaṃ bālāgrāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgastasmādapi śatatamāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāga iti tadidamunmānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3509: aṇurātmā na śarīravyāpīti na sarvāṅgīṇaśaityopalabdhiḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3511: tvaksaṃyukto hi jīvaḥ tvakca sakalaśarīravyāpinīti tvagvyāpyātmasaṃbandhaḥ sakalaśaityopalabdhau samartha ityarthaḥ //23//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3514: candanabindoḥ pratyakṣato 'lpīyastvaṃ buddhvā yuktā kalpanā bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3515: yasya tu saṃdigdhamaṇutvaṃ sarvāṅgīṇaṃ ca kāryamupalabhyate tasya vyāpitvamautsargikamapahāya neyaṃ kalpanāvakāśaṃ labhata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3522: ye tu sāvayavatvāccandanabindoraṇusaṃcāreṇa dehavyāptirupapadyate na tvātmano 'navayavasyāṇusaṃcāraḥ saṃbhavī,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3523: tasmādvaiṣamyamiti manyante tān pratīdamucyate guṇādvā lokavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3534: viśleṣānupraveśābhyāṃ ca sannapi viśleṣaḥ sūkṣmatvānnopalakṣyate iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3539: upalabhyamāno vā sūkṣma upalabhyeta na sthūla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3550: na jātu ghaṭakarakādisaṃyogā nabhaso nabho vyaśruvate 'pitvalpāneva ghaṭakarakādīn,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3551: itarathā yatra nabhastatra sarvatra ghaṭakarakādyupalambha iti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3555: 'pyadhiṣṭhitā tvagadhiṣṭhitaiveti śarīravyāpī jīvaḥ śaknoti sarvāṅgīṇaṃ śaityamanubhavituṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3557: aṇustu jīvo yatrāsti tasminneva śarīrapradeśe tadanubhavenna sarvāṅgīṇaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3559: kaṇṭakatodanasya tu prādeśikatayā na sarvāṅgīṇopalabdhiriti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3562: ata eva hi hemante viṣaktāvayavāpyadravyagate 'tisāndre śītasparśe 'nubhūyamānepyanudbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ nopalabhyate yathā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3563: tathā mṛgamadādīnāṃ gandhavāhaviprakīrṇasūkṣmāvayavānāmatisāndre gandhe 'nubhūyamāne rūpasparśau nānubhūyete tatkasya hetoḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3568: apica caitanyaṃ nāma na gumo jīvasya guṇānaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3578: apitu yo 'yaṃ mithyājñānadveṣādyanuṣaktaḥ sa eva pratyātmamanubhavagocaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3579: naca brahmasvabhāvasya jīvātmanaḥ kūṭasthanityasya svataḥ icchādveṣānuṣaṅgasaṃbhava iti buddhiguṇānāṃ teṣāṃ tadabhedādhyāsena taddharmatvādhyāsaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3580: udaśarāvādhyastasyeva candramaso bimbasya toyakampe kamampavattvādhyāsa ityupapāditamadhyāsabhāṣye /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3609: antaḥkaraṇe 'pi sati tasya nityasaṃnidhānāt kasmānnityopalabdhyanupalabdhī na prasajyete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3611: tāvasatyevāntaḥ karaṇe ātmano vendriyāṇāṃ vā stāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3627: nanu 'tadguṇasāratvāt'ityanenaiva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca labdhameveti tadvyutpādanamanarthakamityata āha-tadguṇasāratvādhikāreṇeti
GSP33brsvbh2u:3628: tasyaivaiṣa prapañco ye paśyantyātmā bhoktaiva na karteti tannirākaraṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3636: buddhiścetkartrī bhoktā cātmā tato yasyāpekṣitopāyo bhoktuna tasya kartṛtvaṃ yasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:3637: kartṛtvaṃ naca tasyāpekṣitopāyā iti kiṃ kena saṃgatamiti śāstrasyānarthakatvamavidyamānābhidheyatvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3639: yathā ca tadguṇasāratayāsyāvastusadapi bhoktṛtvaṃ sāṃvyavahārikamevaṃ kartṛtvamapi sāṃvyavahārikaṃ na tu bhāvikam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3648: tadeteṣāṃ prāṇānāmindriyāṇāṃ vijñānena buddhyā vijñānaṃ grahaṇaśaktimādāyopādāyetyupādāne svātantryaṃ nākartuḥ saṃbhavati //35//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3653: sarvatra hi buddhiḥ karaṇarūpā karaṇatvenaiva vyapadiśyate na kartṛtvena,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3666: karaṇādīni kārakāntarāṇi kartā prayuṅkte na tvayaṃ kārakāntaraiḥ prayujyata ityetāvanmātramasya svātantryaṃ na tu kāryakriyāyāṃ na kārakāntarāṇyapekṣata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3667: īdṛśaṃ hi svātantryaṃ neśvarasyāpyatrabhavato 'stītyutsannasaṃkathaḥ kartā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3668: tathā cāyamadṛṣṭaparipākavaśādiṣṭamabhiprepsustatsādhanavibhrameṇāniṣṭopāyaṃ vyāpārayannaniṣṭaṃ prāpnuyādityaniyamaḥ kartṛtvaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3671: tena viṣayāvacchinnameva caitanyaṃ vṛttiriti vijñānamiti cākhyāyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3677: aviparyayāya tu karaṇāntarakalpanāyāṃ nāmni visaṃvāda iti //38//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3687: so 'yamiha kartātmā samādhāvupadiśyamāna ātmanaḥ kartṛtvamavaitīti sūtrārthaḥ //39//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3694: naca svābhāvike kartṛtve saṃbhavatyasatyapavāde tadaupādhikaṃ yuktam atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3696: yathā jñānasvabhāvo jñeyābhāve 'pi nājño bhavatyevaṃ kartṛsvabhāvo 'pi kriyāveśābhāve 'pi nākartā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3704: tasya ca kadācidapyasaṃsarge kathaṃ tacchaktiyogo nirviṣayāyāḥ śakterasaṃbhavāt tathāca
GSP33brsvbh2u:3705: yadi tatsidhyarthaṃ tadviṣaḥ kriyāveśo 'bhyupeyate tathā sati tatsvabhāvasya svabhāvocchedābhāvādbhāvanāśaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3707: kriyāyā duḥkhatvānna vigalitasakaladuḥkhaparamānandāvasthā mokṣaḥ syādityāśayavānāha-na svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamātmana iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3712: tathāca tayākṣiptaṃ śakyaṃ sadaiva syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3731: ātmaiko 'pi bhinna iva viśuddho 'pyaviśuddha iva tataścaikabuddhyādisaṃghātāpagame
GSP33brsvbh2u:3732: tatra mukta ivetaratra baddha iva yathā maṇikṛpāṇādyupadhānabhedādekameva mukhaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3733: nāneva dīrghamiva vṛttamiva śyāmamivāvadātamiva anyatamopadhānavigame tatra muktamivānyatropahitamiveti
GSP33brsvbh2u:3736: nāpi buddhyādisaṃghātāsya kintu buddhyādyupahitasyātmasvabhāvasya jīvabhāvamāpannasyeti paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3742: takṣṇaḥ pāṇyādayaḥ santi tairayaṃ vāsyādīn vyāpārayan bhavatu duḥkhī,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3743: paramātmā tvanavayavaḥ kena manaḥprabhṛtīni vyāpārayediti vaiṣamyaṃ takṣṇo dṛṣṭāntenetyata āha-takṣadṛṣṭāntaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3747: manaḥprabhṛtīni tu karaṇādīni vyāpārayan duḥkhītyetāvatāsya sāmyaṃ na tu sarvathā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3748: yathātmā ca jīvo 'vayavāntarānapekṣaḥ svaśarīraṃ vyāpārayatyevaṃ manaḥprabhṛtīni tu karaṇāntarāṇi vyāpārayatīti pramāṇasiddhe niyogaparyanuyogānupapattiḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3750: yatparaṃ hi śāstraṃ sa eva śāstrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3752: tena yathālokasiddhaṃ kartāramapekṣya svaviṣaye pravartamānaṃ na puṃsaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamavagamayitutsahate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3755: aupādhikaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ nopādhyapagame saṃbhavatīti svābhāvikameva yujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3756: apica yatrāpi karaṇamasti tatrāpi kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaśravaṇātsvābhāvikameva yuktamityāha-tathopādāne 'pīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3759: apica svapne yādṛśaṃ jñānaṃ tādṛśo vihāro 'pītyāha-vihāro 'pi ca tatreti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3761: yadyapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ kevale kartari śrūyate tathāpi karmakaraṇopadhānakṛtamasya kartṛtvaṃ na śuddhasya,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3763: nanu yadi na kevalasya kartṛtvamapi tu karaṇādisahitasyaiva,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3767: api ceyamupādānaśrutiḥ karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraparā na svātantryaparā kartṛvibhaktistu bhāktī /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3771: viklidyanti taṇḍulā jvalanti kāṣṭhāni bibhartti sthālīti hi svavyāpāre sarveṣāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3773: tatkiṃ buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva na karaṇatvamityata āha-upalabdhyapekṣaṃ tveṣāṃ karaṇatvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3774: nanvevaṃ sati tasyāmevātmanaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamastvityata āha-naca tasyāṃ ulabdhāvapyasya svābhāvikakartṛtvamastikasmāt nityopalabdhisvarūpatvātātmanaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3775: nahi nitye svabhāve cāsti bhāvasya vyāpāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3780: nahi śarīrādi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gamyaṃ tasyāmeva gantṛ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3785: yadā caupalabdhau buddherakartṛtvaṃ tadā yaduktaṃ buddherupalabdhṛtve karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3786: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvāda iti tanna bhavatītyāha-na caivaṃ sati karaṇāntarakalpanābuddherupalabdhṛtvābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3790: kintu caitanyameva viṣayāvacchinnaṃ vṛttiriti copalabdhiriti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3791: tasya tu tattadviṣayāvacchede vṛttau buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇatvamātmanaśca tadupadhānenāhaṅkārapūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ yujyata iti //40//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3794: yadetajjīvānāmaupādhikaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tatpravartanālakṣaṇeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu neśvaramaparaṃ pravartakaṃ kalpayitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3796: naceśvaro dveṣapakṣapātarahito jīvān sādhvasādhuni karmaṇi pravartayitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3798: sa hi svatantraḥ kāruṇiko dharma eva jantūn pravartayennādharme /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3799: tataśca tatpreritā jantavaḥ sarve dhārmikā eveti sukhina eva syurna duḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3800: svatantrāstu rāgādiprayuktāḥ pravartamānā dharmādharmapracayavanto vaicitryamanubhavantīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3801: evañca vidhiniṣedhayorarthavattvamitarathā tu sarvathā jīvā avastatantrā itīśvareṇaiva pravartyanta iti kṛtaṃ vidhiniṣedhābhyām /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3803: tasmāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati'ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ samastavidhiniṣedhaśrutivirodhāllokavirodhāccaiśvaryapraśaṃsāparatayā neyā iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3804: 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati'ityādayastāvacchachrutayaḥ sarvavyāpāreṣu jantūnāmīśvaratantratāmāhuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3807: yena pravartakeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu tatkalpanā virudhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3808: na ceśvaratantratve dharma eva jantūnāṃ pravṛtteḥ sukhitvameva na vaicitryamiti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3809: yadyapyayamīśvaro vītarāgastathāpi pūrvapūrvajantukarmāpekṣaya jantūn dharmādharmayoḥ pravartayan na dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ viṣamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3813: nahīśvaraḥ prabalatarapavana iva jantūn pravartayatyapi tu taccaitanyamanurudhyamāno rāgādyupahāramukhena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3815: tadanenābhisaṃdhinoktam-parāyatte 'pi hi kartṛtve karotyeva jīva iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3816: tasmādvidhiniṣedhaśāstrāvirodhāllokasya sthūladarśitvāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati'ityādiśruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3821: īśvara eva vidhiniṣedhayosthāne niyujyeta yadvidhiniṣedhayoḥ phalaṃ tadīśvareṇa tatpratipāditadharmādharmanirapekṣeṇa kṛtamiti vidhiniṣedhayorānarthakyam
GSP33brsvbh2u:3822: na kevalamānarthakyaṃ viparītaṃ cāpadyeta ityāha-tathā vihitakāriṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3828: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke / BBs_2,3.43 /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3834: na ca 'brahmadāśā brahmakitavāḥ'ityādyāśca śrutayo dāśā brahma kitavā brahmetyādipratipādanaparā jīvānāṃ brahmaṇo bhede 'vakalpyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3835: na caitābhirbhedābhedapratipādanaparābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ sākṣādaṃśatvapratipādakācca mantravarṇāt 'pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni'ityādeḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3837: niratiśayopādhisaṃpadā ca vibhūtiyogeneśvaraḥ svāṃśānāmapi nikṛṣṭopādhīnāmīṣṭa iti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3839: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāṃśatve tadgatā vedanā brahmaṇo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3841: tataśca brahmabhūyaṅgatasya samastajīvagatavedanānubhavaprasaṅga iti varaṃ saṃsāra eva mukteḥ tatra hi svagatavedanāmātrāmanubhavānna bhūri duḥkhamanubhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3842: muktastu sarvajīvavedanābhāgiti prayatnena muktiranarthabahulatayā parihartavyā syāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3844: naca brahmaiva sadasantastu jīvā iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3847: advaitaśrutayastu jātideśakālābhedanimittopacārāditi prāpte 'bhidhīyate-anadhigatārthāvabodhanāni pramāṇāni viśeṣataḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3850: yena ca vākyamupakramyate madhye ca parāmṛśyate ante copasaṃhriyate tatraiva tasya tātparyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3853: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvamapi prāgevopacaritatvamityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3854: tasmādvaite bhāvike sthite jīvabhāvastasya brahmaṇo 'nādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedādekasyaiva bimbasya darpaṇādyupādhibhedātpratibimbabhedāḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3857: yataḥ pratibimbānāmiva śyāmatāvadātatādirjīvānāmeva nānāvedanābhisaṃbandho brahmaṇastu bimbasyeva na tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3858: yathāca darpaṇāpanaye tatpratibimbaṃ bimbabhāve 'vatiṣṭhate na kṛpāṇe pratibimbitamapi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3859: evamavidyopadhānavigame jīve brahmabhāva iti siddhaṃ jīvo brahmāṃśa iva tattantratayā na tvaṃśa iti tātparyārthāḥ //43//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3869: tadyathā-buddhikarmendriyāṇi bāhyāni daśa buddhimanasī vṛttibhedamātreṇa bhinne apyekīkṛtyaikamantaḥkaraṇaṃ śarīraṃ pañca viṣayā iti saptadaśako rāśiḥ //47//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3876: nahi kūṭasthanityasyātmanopariṇāmino 'sti dehena saṃyogaḥ samavāyo vānyo vā kaścit saṃbandhaḥ sakaladharmātigatvādityabhisaṃdhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3878: ayamarthaḥ-satyaṃ nāsti kaścidātmano dehādibhiḥ pāramārthikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3881: so 'yaṃ sāṃvṛttastādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho na pāramārthika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3895: samastabuddhyādivyatirekavedinastu karmabhoktṛtvābhimānarahitasya nādhikāraḥ karmaṇi tathāca na yatheṣṭaceṣṭā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3901: yeṣāṃ tu sāṃkhyānāṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ vā sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāṃ pāramārthikīmicchatāṃ bahava ātmānaḥ sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3902: tatra praśnapūrvakaṃ sāṃkhyān prati vyatikramaṃ tāvadāha-kathamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3903: yādṛśastādṛśo guṇasaṃbandhaḥ sarvān puruṣān pratyaviśiṣṭa iti tatkṛte sukhaduḥkhe sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭe /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3909: yaṃ ca puruṣaṃ prayatnena bhogāpavargau puruṣārthau sādhitau taṃ prati samāptādhikāratayā nivartate puruṣāntaraṃ tu pratyasamāptādhikāraṃ pravartate
GSP33brsvbh2u:3910: evaṃ ca muktasaṃsārivyavasthopapatteḥ sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāpi bhaviṣyatīti nirākaroti-nahīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3911: sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ vibhutvāt pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyadamuṃ puruṣaṃ pratyanenārthaḥ sādhita ityetadeva nāsti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3917: kāṇādādīnāṃ tvātmasamavāpyadṛṣṭaṃ pratyātmamasādhāraṇaṃ tatkṛtaśca manasā sahātmanaḥ svasvāmibhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho 'nādiradṛṣṭabhedānāmanāditvāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3920: nahi tasya manasa ātmāntarairyaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa eva svāmināpi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3927: bhede hi tatkalpanā tataśca bheda iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3929: bhāṣyakṛtā tu prauḍhavāditayā kāṇādān pratyapyadṛṣṭāniyamādityādīni sūtrāṇi yojitāni /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3937: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3946: śabdaikapramāṇasamadhigamyā hi mahābhūtotpattistasyā yatra śabdo nivartate tatra tatpramāṇabhāvena tadabhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3951: rāddhāntastu syādetadevaṃ yadi sargādau prāṇasadbhāvaśrutirananyathāsiddhā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3954: tatrādhikāripuruṣaḥ prajāpatirapranaṣṭa eva trailokyamātraṃ pralīnamatastadīyān prāṇānapekṣya sā śrutirupapannārthā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3996: eṣāṃ tu viṣayā atigrahāstvaṣṭāveva 'prāṇo vai grahaḥ so 'pānenātigraheṇa gṛhīto 'pānena hi gandhān jighrati'ityādinā saṃdarbheṇoktāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3999: dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve ghrāṇe ekā vāgiti sapta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4002: nava vai puruṣe prāṇāsta uktā nābhirdaśamīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4004: tadyathā-buddhīndriyāṇi ghrāṇādīni pañca karmendriyāṇyapi hastādīni pañca ātmaikādaśa,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4011: atra praśnapūrvaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti-kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4018: ye sapta śīrṣaṇyāḥ śrotrādayaste prāṇā ityukte itareṣāmaśīrṣaṇyānāṃ hastādīnāmaprāṇatvaṃ gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4019: yathā dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte vāmena na paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4020: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi śrutivipratiṣedo yadyapi ca pūrvasaṃkhyāsu na parāsāṃ saṃkhyānāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:4035: naca siddhe vastuni anuṣṭhāna iva vikalpaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4043: nahi jātu mūkādayaḥ satsvapi viharaṇādyavagatasadbhāveṣu pādādiṣu buddhīndriyeṣu vā vacanādimanto bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4048: ekameva tvantaḥkaraṇaṃ mananānmana iti cābhimānādahaṅkāra iti cādhyavasāyādbuddhiriti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4051: tadevamekādaśānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ vyavasthānādekādaśa prāṇā iti śrutirāñjasī /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4053: tatrāvayutyanuvādena saptāṣṭanavadaśasaṃkhyāśrutayo yathaikaṃ vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte iti trīn vṛṇīta ityetadānuguṇyāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4054: dvādaśatrayodaśasaṃkhyāśrutī tu kathañcidvṛttibhedena bhedaṃ vivakṣitvopāsanādiparatayā netavye /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4056: apica śīrṣaṇyānāṃ prāṇānāṃ yatsaptatvābhidhānaṃ tadapi caturṣvevavyavasthāpanīyam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4060: pihitaikacakṣuṣastu na tādṛśī rūpopalabdhirbhavati yādṛśī samagracakṣuṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4064: iyamaparā sūtradvayayojanā-saptaiva prāṇāḥ cakṣurghrāṇarasanavākśrotramanastvaca utkrāntimantaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4068: tasmātsarvaśabdasya prakṛtāpekṣatvātsaptaiva prāṇā utkrāmanti na pāṇyādaya iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4077: tasmācchrutyantarebhyaḥ smṛteśca sarvaśabdārthāsaṃkocācca sarveṣāmutkrameṇa sthite 'sminnaivaṃ yaduktaṃ saptaiveti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4082: vṛttisteṣāṃ śarīradeśatayā prādeśikī tannibandhanā ca gatyāgatiśrutiriti manyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4083: tānpratyāha-aṇavaśca prāṇā anudbhūtarūpaspaśartā cāṇutvaṃ duradhigamatvānna tu paramāṇutvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:4086: sarvagatatve 'pi dehāvacchinnānāmeva karaṇatvaṃ tena na vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭavastūpalambhaprasaṅga iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4087: hanta prāptāprāptāvivekena śarīrāvacchinnānāmeva teṣāṃ karaṇatvamindriyatvamiti na vyāpināmindriyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4088: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvādo nārthe 'smābhistadindriyamucyate bhavadbhistu vṛttiriti siddhamaṇavaḥ prāṇā iti //7//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4094: ca vyāpārānupapatte prāṇasadbhāvājjyeṣṭhatvaśruteśca na brahmavikāraḥ prāṇa iti manvānasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:4097: kintu sṛṣṭikāraṇamānīt jīvati sma āsīditi yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4104: atra hi 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ'iti śrutervāyureva prāṇa iti pratibhāti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4105: athavā 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā'iti vāyorbhedena prāṇasya śravaṇādetadvirodhādvaraṃ tantrāntarīyameva prāṇasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:4106: śrutī ca viruddhārthe kathañcinneṣyete iti sāmānyakaraṇavṛttireva prāṇo 'stu /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4107: na cātrāpi karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthakprāṇasyānukramaṇaśrutivirodho vṛttivṛttimatorbhedāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4109: sa hi militānāṃ vendriyāṇāṃ vṛttirbhavet pratyekaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4116: apica yatsaṃbhūya kārakāṇi niṣpādayanti tatpradhānavyāpārānuguṇāvāntaravyāpāreṇaiva yathā vayasāṃ prātisviko vyāpāraḥ pañjaracālanānuguṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4117: na cendriyāṇāṃ prāṇe pradhānavyāpāre janayitavye 'sti tādṛśaḥ kaścidavāntaravyāpārastadanuguṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4118: ye ca rūpādipratyayā na te tadanuguṇāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4119: tasmānnendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ prāṇastathā ca vṛttivṛttimatoḥ kathañcidbhedavivakṣayā na pṛthagupadeśo gamayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4122: kintu vāyubheda evādhyātmāmāpannaḥ pañcavyūhaḥ prāṇa iti //9//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4125: yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati guṇabhūtatvājjīvasya ca śreṣṭhatvājjīvaḥ svatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi prādhānyāt śreṣṭhatvācca svatantraḥ prāpnoti
GSP33brsvbh2u:4126: naca dvayoḥ svatantrayorekasmin śarīre ekavākyatvamupapadyata ityaparyāyaṃ viruddhānekadikkriyatayā deha unmathyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4129: yadyapi cakṣurādyapekṣayā śreṣṭhatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ ca prāṇasya tathāpi saṃhatatvādacetanatvādbhautikatvāccakṣurādibhiḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:4130: sahaśiṣṭatvāccaca puruṣārthatvāt puruṣaṃ prati pāratantryaṃ śayanāsanādivadbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4131: tathāca yathā mantrītareṣu naiyogikeṣu pradhānamapi rājānamapekṣyāsvatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi cakṣurādiṣu pradhānamapi jīve 'svatantra iti //10//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4133: syādetaccakṣurādibhiḥ saha śāsanena karaṇaṃ cet prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4139: ekādaśatvaṃ ca karaṇānāṃ vyākupyetāpi tu prāṇāntarāsaṃbhavi dehendriyavidhāraṇakāraṇaṃ prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4140: tacca śrutiprabandhena darśitaṃ na kevalaṃ śarīrendriyadhāraṇamasya kāryam //11//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4148: yadyapi mithyājñāne 'pyasti vastuśūnyatā tathāpi na tasya vyavahārahetutāsti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4154: yadyapi cātrābhāvapratyayālambanā vṛttirneṣyate tathāpi vikṣepasaṃskāralakṣaṇā manovṛttirihāstyeveti sarvamavadātam //12//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4159: yathā vibhuna ākāśasya kuṭakarakādyavacchedātkuṭādisāmyamiti prāpta āha-aṇuśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4162: yattvasya vibhutvānmānaṃ tadādhidaivikena sūtrātmanā samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa na tvādhyātmikena rūpeṇa /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4163: tadāśrayāśca 'samaḥ pluṣiṇā'ityevamādyāḥ śrutayo dehasāmyameva prāṇasyāhuḥ svarūpato na tu karakākāśavatparopādhikatayā kathañcinnetavyā iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:4166: yaddhi yatkāryaṃ kurvaddṛṣṭaṃ tatsvamahimnaiva karotityeṣa tāvadutsargaḥ parādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tasya balavatpramāṇāntaravaśāt syādetat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4171: apica ya indriyāṇāmadhiṣṭhātā sa eva bhokteti devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvena svāmitvaṃ śarīra iti na jīvaḥ svāmī syādbhoktā ca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4172: tasmādagnyādyupacāro vāgādiṣu prakāśakatvādinā kenacinnimittena gamayitatavyo natu svarūpeṇāgnyādidevatānāṃ mukhādyanupraveśa iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4173: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-nānāvidhāsu tāvacchrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca tatra tatra vāgādiṣvagnyādidevatādhiṣṭhānavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4176: saṃbhavati tu devatānāmindriyādyārṣeṇa jñānena sākṣātkṛtavatīnāṃ tatsvarūpabhedatadupayogabhedavijñānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4177: tasmāttāstā eva devatāstattatkaraṇādhiṣṭhātrya iti yuktaṃ na tu jīvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4179: anekeṣāmadhiṣṭhātaṇāmekaḥ parameśvaro 'sti niyantāntaryāmī tadvaśādvipratipitsavo 'pi na vipratipattumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4182: nahi yantā rathamadhitiṣṭhinnapi tatsādhyavijayāderbhoktāpi tu svāmyeva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4183: evaṃ devatā adhiṣṭhātryo 'pi na bhoktryastāsāṃ tāvanmātrasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4185: naca narādiśarīrocitaṃ duḥkhabahulamupabhogaṃ sukhamayyo devatā arhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4194: indriyāṇyevāsya jyeṣṭhasya śreṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4202: naca bhedena vyapadeśo bhedasādhanam 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ'ityādirmanaso 'pīndriyebhyo 'sti bhedena vyapadeśa ityanindriyatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4203: smṛtivaśāttu tasyendriyatve indriyāṇāmapi prāṇādbhedena vyapadiṣṭānāmapyasti prāṇasvabhāvatve 'hanta asyaiva rūpamasāma'iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4204: tasmādupapatteḥ śruteśca prāṇasyaiva vṛttaya ekādaśendriyāṇi na tattvāntarāṇīti iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4214: tatrāpi paurvāparyālocanāyāṃ bheda eva pratīyata ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4215: tasmādbahuśrutivirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca prāṇarūpatābhidhānamindriyāṇāṃ prāṇāyattatayā bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4218: naca prāṇe bhedavyapadeśabāhulyaṃ tathā netuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4220: tathā jyeṣṭhe prāṇaśabdasya mukhyatvādindriyeṣu tatastattvāntareṣu lākṣaṇikaḥ prāṇaśabda iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4223: anye tu bhedaśabdādhyāhārabhiyā bhedaśruteśceti paunaruktyabhiyā ca tacchabdasya cānantaroktaparamārthakatvādanyathā varṇayāñcakruḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4224: kimekādaśaiva vāgādaya indriyāṇyāho prāṇo 'pīti viśaye indrasyātmano liṅgamindriyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4231: indraliṅgatā tu vyutpattimātranimittaṃ yathā gacchatīti gauriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4235: tasmādrūḍhervāgādaya evendriyāṇi na prāṇa iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4243: satprakriyāyāṃ 'tatteja aikṣata'ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa tejo 'bannānāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ vidhāyopadiśyate-'seyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:4244: devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi
GSP33brsvbh2u:4246: asyārthaḥ-pūrvoktaṃ bahubhavanamīkṣaṇaprayojanamadyāpi sarvathā na niṣpannamiti punarīkṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:4247: kṛtavatī bahubhavanameva prayojanamuddiśya kathaṃ hantedānīmahamimā yathoktāsteja
GSP33brsvbh2u:4248: ādyāstisro devatāḥ pūrvasṛṣṭāvubhūtena saṃprati smaraṇasaṃnidhāpitena jīvena prāṇadhāraṇakartrātmanānupraviśya
GSP33brsvbh2u:4249: buddhyādibhūtamātrāyāmadarśa iva mukhabimbaṃ toya iva candramaso bimbaṃ chāyāmātratayānupraviśya
GSP33brsvbh2u:4250: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te vyākaravāṇi vispaṣṭaṃ karavāṇīdamasya nāmedaṃ ca rūpamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4251: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ tejo 'bannātmanā tryātmikāṃ tryātmikāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ karavāṇīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4253: yadi jīvakartṛkaṃ tataḥ 'ākāśo ha vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā'ityādiśrutivirodhādanadhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4256: tatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakaraṇe ca ghaṭapaṭādirūpakaraṇe ca jīvakartṛtvadarśanādihāpi trivṛtkaraṇe nāmarūpakaraṇe cāsti saṃbhāvanā jīvasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:4257: tathāca yogyatvādanena jīveneti vyākaravāṇīti pradhānakriyayā saṃbadhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4266: yadi punarasya sākṣātkartṛbhāvo bhavedanena jīvenetyanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4268: prayojakakartustatsākṣātkartā karaṇaṃ bhavati pradhānakriyoddeśena prayojakena prayojyakarturvyāpanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4269: tasmādatra jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇe 'nyatra tu parameśvarasyeti virodhādanadhyavasāya iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4270: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-parameśvarasyaivehāpi nāmarūpavyākartṛtvamupadiśyate na tu jīvasya,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4272: nanvanyatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakarmaṇi ghaṭaśarāvādirūpakarmaṇi ca kartṛtvadarśanādihāpi yogyatā saṃbhāvyata iti cet / na /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4278: anupraviśya vyākaravāṇīti samānakartṛtve ktvaḥ smaraṇāt praveśanakarturjīvasyaiva
GSP33brsvbh2u:4279: vyākartṛtvamupadiśyate 'nyathā tu parameśvarasya vyākartṛtve jīvasya praveṣṭṛtve
GSP33brsvbh2u:4280: bhinnakartṛkatvena ktvaḥ prayogo vyāhanyetetyatrāha-naca jīvo nāmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4286: tathāhi-yo 'nnasyāṇiṣṭho bhāgastanmanastejasastu yo 'ṇiṣṭho bhāgaḥ sa vāgityatra hi kāṇādānāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāsti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4293: vāṅmanasa iti vaktavye māṃsādyabhidhānaṃ siddhena saha sādhyasyopanyāso dṛṣṭāntalābhāya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4294: yathā māṃsādi bhaumādyevaṃ vāṅmanase api taijasabhaume ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4299: tasmādasati bādhake śrutirāñjasī nānyathā kathañcinnetumuciteti kañciddoṣamityuktaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ darśayannāha pūrvapakṣī-yadi sarvameva iti //21//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4302: tribṛtkaraṇāviśeṣe 'pi yasya ca yatra bhūyastvaṃ tena tasya vyapadeśa ityarthaḥ //22//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4303: iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmadbhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
